original: rdo rje lcags khu ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags khu ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas so //
translated: The vajra chain is from the perspective of the essence of Ak·π£obhya.

original: zhags pa che zhes pa ni zhags pa dang sdom zhes pa 'bebs pa'i rnam @65b grangs te /
analyzed: zhags pa che zhes pa ni zhags pa dang sdom zhes pa 'bebs pa'i rnam @65b grangs te /
translated: The great noose is a noose and a fetter, which is a synonym for binding.

original: zhags pa yang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas zhags pa che ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //
analyzed: zhags pa yang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas zhags pa che ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //
translated: It is a noose and it is great, thus it is the great noose, which is Vajra-ƒÄve≈õa.

original: de yang don yod grub pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: de yang don yod grub pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: It is also from the perspective of the essence of Amoghasiddhi.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dir /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dir /
translated: Then the BhagavƒÅn, here,üîΩsaid to VajrapƒÅ·πái, VajrapƒÅ·πái,

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
translated: The great Buddha Vairocana.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs rnams kyis sngags kyi yig 'bru'i rnam par dbye ba dang po'i mtha' can gyi bstan pa brjod par bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa mngon par rjod par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs rnams kyis sngags kyi yig 'bru'i rnam par dbye ba dang po'i mtha' can gyi bstan pa brjod par bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the collection of words that express this, ending with the first case, is the mantra syllables.

original: de nas 'dir yang sngon bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa sku mdog dkar po dang / 'khor lo dang ral gri phyag na 'dzin par gyur pa rnams phyung ste /
analyzed: de nas 'dir yang sngon bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa sku mdog dkar po dang / 'khor lo dang ral gri phyag na 'dzin par gyur pa rnams phyung ste /
translated: Then, as before, one should visualize the great Vairocana and so forth, white in color, holding a wheel and sword in their hands, emerging.

original: phyung nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song ste /
analyzed: phyung nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song ste /

analyzed: sems can thams cad rang gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas dag par byas te /
translated: Having purified all sentient beings through their own door of liberation,

analyzed: yang phyir log nas mtshan gyi sngags kyi yig 'brur gyur nas rang gi 'khor lo la 'khor lo can du gyur te gnas par blta bar bya'o //

translated: Then, as above, the bodhisattva who practices by way of mantra should recite the Litany of the Names of Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

analyzed: de yon tan gyi tshogs pa bkod pa de rnams nyid thob par 'gyur ro //

original: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i 'khor lo gnyis pa la mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i gzhi rnams ni rtag pa la sogs pa rigs kyi dbye bas sum cu rtsa drug tu rnam par phye ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i 'khor lo gnyis pa la mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i gzhi rnams ni rtag pa la sogs pa rigs kyi dbye bas sum cu rtsa drug tu rnam par phye ste /
translated: In the second wheel of Great Vairocana, the bases of the syllables of the mantra of the names are divided into thirty-six by the division of the families beginning with the steadfast.

analyzed: gong ma bzhin du thams cad sngags su bsgrub po zhes pa ni man ngag go //
translated: As above, all are accomplished by way of mantra. This is the instruction.

original: tshigs bcad ni tshig rkang gcig ma tshang ba dang nyi shu rtsa lnga ste /
analyzed: tshigs bcad ni tshig rkang gcig ma tshang ba dang nyi shu rtsa lnga ste /

analyzed: mtshan nyid sngags kyi yi ge rnams ni brgya brgyad cu rtsa gcig brtsis pa yin no //

original: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par lnga ba zhes bya ba las shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la bstod pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas pa ste drug pa'o /

translated: This concludes the sixth chapter of the commentary on the Ornament of Clear Realization, called ‚ÄúThe Chapter on the Praise of the Wisdom of the Completely Pure Dharmadhatu.‚Äù

translated: Now, the third chapter, the praise of the body of all the Tathagatas, the Blessed One, in the form of the Lord of the Three Realms, the wrathful mandala, the nature of mirror-like wisdom, is taught.

original: rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?üîΩIt is said:

analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las ;

analyzed: rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa // zhes pa ni / de la gad mo chen po ni rgyun chad pa med pa'i don to //

original: de la dpal thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud las te /üîΩgad rgyangs can ni gad mo ni dgod pa'o //
analyzed: de la dpal thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud las te / gad rgyangs can ni gad mo ni dgod pa'o //
translated: This is from the Tantra of the Array of the Inconceivable Secret of the Glorious Ones.üîΩGuffaws is laughter.

original: gad rgyangs te gsang mthon pos bzhad pa ni gad rgyangs so //
analyzed: gad rgyangs te gsang mthon pos bzhad pa ni gad rgyangs so //
translated: Loud guffaws is laughter with a secret high pitch.

original: rdo rje gad mo ni ye shes kyi bshad pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gad mo ni ye shes kyi bshad pa ste /
translated: The great laughter of the vajra is the explanation of pristine consciousness.

original: de yang yid kyi'o //
analyzed: de yang yid kyi'o //
translated: Moreover, it is mental.

original: cher sgrogs pa ni 'jig rten gsum gang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: cher sgrogs pa ni 'jig rten gsum gang bar byed pa ste /
translated: The great proclamation is that which fills the three worlds.

analyzed: chen po yang de yin la sgrogs pa yang de nyid yin pas cher sgrogs pa'o //
translated: It is great and it is a proclamation, thus it is the great proclamation.

original: bzhi po 'di yang rgyud de nyid las bstan to //üîΩrdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
analyzed: bzhi po 'di yang rgyud de nyid las bstan to // rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
translated: These four are also taught in that very tantra.üîΩVajrasattva, the great being,

original: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
translated: VajrarƒÅja, the great bliss,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /

analyzed: bde ba chen po ni dpal bde mchog gi rgyud las so //

original: de la bde ba chen po zhes pa ni /

translated: the untainted bliss of the tathagatas, which is called great bliss.üîΩThis is stated in that very tantra:

original: de nyid las gsungs pa'ang bde ba ni sam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid las gsungs pa'ang bde ba ni sam zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje drag po dga' ba che // rdo rje h'um ste h'um zhes sgrogs //

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: the supreme of all.

analyzed: de la rdo rje drag po ni dpal rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyan gyi rgyud las gsungs so //

original: de rnams dang gang ldan pa de ni /
analyzed: de rnams dang gang ldan pa de ni /
translated: One who has those is

translated: vajra h≈´·πÉ, proclaiming h≈´·πÉ.üîΩHolding a vajra arrow as a weapon,

original: rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod //üîΩces pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod // ces pa ni /
translated: a vajra sword cuts everything.üîΩThis is from the glorious Vajra of Delight Tantra.

analyzed: de la mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa ni dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud las te /

original: rdo rjes mtshon pa'i mda' dang gzhu de dag nyid mtshon cha ste /
analyzed: rdo rjes mtshon pa'i mda' dang gzhu de dag nyid mtshon cha ste /

analyzed: de 'dzin pas na mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje ral gri ni dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las te /

analyzed: rdo rje dang ral gri ni rdo rje ral gri'o //

analyzed: mtshon cha de gnyis dang gang ldan pa de rdo rje ral gri'o //

analyzed: ma lus gcod pa'ang de nyid la bya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can // rdo rje gcig pu g-yul sel ba //

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /

analyzed: de la sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang ni dpal rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las te /
translated: The vajra-holder is taught in the glorious Tantra of Vairocana's Enlightenment:

original: sna tshogs rdo rje ni rdo rje rgya gram ste //üîΩde 'dzin pas na sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang ngo //üîΩrdo rje can ni rgyud de nyid las so //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje ni rdo rje rgya gram ste // de 'dzin pas na sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang ngo // rdo rje can ni rgyud de nyid las so //

original: de nyid rdo rje dang 'dra bas rdo rje ni ye shes te /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje dang 'dra bas rdo rje ni ye shes te /

original: mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: rdo rje gcig pu ni dpal gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal pa'i rgyud las so //
analyzed: rdo rje gcig pu ni dpal gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal pa'i rgyud las so //

original: rdo rje yang de yin la gcig pu yang de nyid yin pas rdo rje gcig pu ste /
analyzed: rdo rje yang de yin la gcig pu yang de nyid yin pas rdo rje gcig pu ste /

analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: g-yul sel ba ni dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las te /

original: g-yul ni 'thab pa ste /
analyzed: g-yul ni 'thab pa ste /

analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'thab pa'o //

original: de 'joms pas na g-yul sel ba'o //
analyzed: de 'joms pas na g-yul sel ba'o //

original: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //

original: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
analyzed: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //

original: zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud las te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud las te /

analyzed: de la rdo rje 'bar ba ni rdo rje 'bar ba'o //

analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i mi bzad pa'i mig dang gang ldan pa de /

analyzed: ces pa'o // skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //

analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba dang 'dra ba'i skra gang dang ldan pa de /

analyzed: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste // zhes so // rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che //

analyzed: de la rdo rje 'bebs pa ni rdo rje 'bebs pa ste /

analyzed: mig brgya pa ni mig brgya dang gang ldan pa de ni mig brgya pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje'i mig ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i spyan dang gang ldan pa de ni rdo rje mig go // rdo rje'i ba spu myu gu'i lus //

original: de gnyis ni dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las gsungs te /
analyzed: de gnyis ni dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las gsungs te /
translated: Those two are taught in the glorious Vajra Essence Ornament Tantra.

original: de la rdo rje'i ba spu myu gu'i lus ni rdo rje dngos po'i ba spu ste /
analyzed: de la rdo rje'i ba spu myu gu'i lus ni rdo rje dngos po'i ba spu ste /
translated: There, the body of vajra hairs and sprouts is the vajra substance hairs.

original: de rnams kyi myu gur gyur cing phur bur gyur pa'i lus dang gang ldan pa de ni rdo rje ba spu myu gu'i lus so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi myu gur gyur cing phur bur gyur pa'i lus dang gang ldan pa de ni rdo rje ba spu myu gu'i lus so //
translated: The body that has those as sprouts and stakes is the body of vajra hairs and sprouts.

original: rdo rje spu ni gcig pu lus ni gcig pu yang de yin la lus kyang de nyid yin pas gcig pu lus so //
analyzed: rdo rje spu ni gcig pu lus ni gcig pu yang de yin la lus kyang de nyid yin pas gcig pu lus so //
translated: The body of a single vajra hair is a single body, and it is also a body, so it is a single body.

original: rdo rje spu ni gcig pu ye shes kyi spu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje spu ni gcig pu ye shes kyi spu'o //
translated: The single vajra hair is a wisdom hair.

original: des mtshon pa'i lus gcig pu dang gang ldan pa de rdo rje ba spu ni gcig pu lus so //üîΩsen mo brtsams pa rdo rje'i rtse /
analyzed: des mtshon pa'i lus gcig pu dang gang ldan pa de rdo rje ba spu ni gcig pu lus so // sen mo brtsams pa rdo rje'i rtse /
translated: The body that is illustrated by that single body is the body of a single vajra hair.üîΩThe tips of the nails are vajra tips.

original: rdo rje'i snying po pags pa mkhregs //
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po pags pa mkhregs //
translated: The vajra essence is the tough skin.

original: zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las de gnyis gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las de gnyis gsungs te /
translated: Those two are taught in the glorious Vajra Peak Tantra.

original: de la / sen mo brtsams pa rdo rje rtse //üîΩzhes pa la /
analyzed: de la / sen mo brtsams pa rdo rje rtse //üîΩzhes pa la /
translated: There, the tips of the nails are vajra tips.

original: rdo rje rtse mo ste rtse mo ni thog ma'i cha yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo ste rtse mo ni thog ma'i cha yin no //
translated: The vajra peak is the peak, the beginning.

original: de 'dra ba'i sen mo ni rdo rje rtse mo'i sen mo can no //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i sen mo ni rdo rje rtse mo'i sen mo can no //
translated: Such nails are vajra-peak nails.

original: de rnams brtsams pa skyes pa de dang gang ldan pa de sen mo brtsams pa rdo rje'i rtse mo'o //
analyzed: de rnams brtsams pa skyes pa de dang gang ldan pa de sen mo brtsams pa rdo rje'i rtse mo'o //
translated: He who has them is vajra-peak-nailed.üîΩVajra-essence skin is the skin that is like a vajra essence, hard and tough.

original: rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs ni rdo rje snying po dang 'dra ba sra zhing mkhregs pa'i pags pa dang gang ldan pa rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs so //üîΩrdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs ni rdo rje snying po dang 'dra ba sra zhing mkhregs pa'i pags pa dang gang ldan pa rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs so // rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan //
translated: He who has it is vajra-essence skin.üîΩHe is glorious with a vajra garland.

original: rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
translated: He is adorned with vajra ornaments.

original: zhes pa ni dpal khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las /
analyzed: zhes pa ni dpal khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las /
translated: This is from the glorious wrathful conqueror tantra.

original: ha la'i 'khor lo las 'di gnyis gsungs te /
analyzed: ha la'i 'khor lo las 'di gnyis gsungs te /
translated: These two are taught in the hala wheel.

original: 'di lta ste /üîΩrdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan //üîΩrdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: 'di lta ste / rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan // rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
translated: It is like this.üîΩHe is glorious with a vajra garland.üîΩHe is adorned with vajra ornaments.

original: zhes pa'o // rdo rje phreng ba 'dzin pas na rdo rje phreng thogs so //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // rdo rje phreng ba 'dzin pas na rdo rje phreng thogs so //
translated: He is vajra-garlanded because he holds a vajra garland.

original: dpal ldan ni de nyid kyi khyad par te /
analyzed: dpal ldan ni de nyid kyi khyad par te /
translated: Glorious is a particular of that,

original: skal pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrdo rje'i rgyan @69a * //
analyzed: skal pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro // rdo rje'i rgyan @69a * //
translated: because of the perfection of good fortune.

original: gyis brgyan pa ste ni rdo rje nyid rgyan yin pas na rdo rje'i rgyan no //
analyzed: gyis brgyan pa ste ni rdo rje nyid rgyan yin pas na rdo rje'i rgyan no //
translated: Adorned with vajra ornaments means that since vajra is an ornament, it is a vajra ornament.

original: des brgyan cing bklubs pas na /
analyzed: des brgyan cing bklubs pas na /
translated: Since it is adorned and covered with that,

original: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
translated: it is adorned with vajra ornaments.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said:

original: gad rgyangs ha ha sgra bral sgrogs //
analyzed: gad rgyangs ha ha sgra bral sgrogs //

original: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra // zhes pa ni /

analyzed: de la gad rgyangs ha ha zhes pa ni dpal dbung bzangs kyi rgyud las te /

original: gad rgyangs ni skad gsang mthon por bzhad pa ste /
analyzed: gad rgyangs ni skad gsang mthon por bzhad pa ste /

original: ha ha zhes byas nas bzhad pa ni gad rgyangs ha ha'o //
analyzed: ha ha zhes byas nas bzhad pa ni gad rgyangs ha ha'o //

analyzed: sgra bral ba ni dpal legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud las so //
translated: Free of sound is from the glorious Tantra of Accomplishing Well.

original: sgra dang bral ba ni sgra dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: sgra dang bral ba ni sgra dang bral ba ste /

original: nang du phyogs pa kho na sgra zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nang du phyogs pa kho na sgra zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of sound is only directed inward.

original: yi ge drug pa ni dpal ye shes drug dang dam tshig yi ge bde mchog gi rgyud las te /
analyzed: yi ge drug pa ni dpal ye shes drug dang dam tshig yi ge bde mchog gi rgyud las te /
translated: The six-syllable mantra is from the glorious Tantra of the Six Awarenesses and the Commitment-Being Cakrasa·πÉvara Tantra.

original: yi ge drug pa dang ldan pa de yi ge drug go //
analyzed: yi ge drug pa dang ldan pa de yi ge drug go //
translated: The one who has the six-syllable mantra is the six-syllable mantra-holder.

original: rdo rje'i sgra ni dpal stong phrag brgya pa de nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud las so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sgra ni dpal stong phrag brgya pa de nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud las so //
translated: The vajra sound is from the glorious Tantra of a Hundred Thousand Stanzas on the Compendium of Reality.

analyzed: rdo rje thog gi sgra lta bu'i sgra dang gang ldan pa de rdo rje'i sgra'o //

original: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba /
analyzed: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba /
translated: The great Ma√±jugho·π£a is the great sound,

original: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa // zhes pa ni /
translated: the one sound in the three worlds.

original: de la 'jam dbyangs ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las te /
analyzed: de la 'jam dbyangs ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las te /
translated: This is from the Tantra of Noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang gang ldan pa de 'jam dbyangs so //
analyzed: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang gang ldan pa de 'jam dbyangs so //
translated: The one who has a gentle and soft voice is Ma√±jugho·π£a.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na chen po zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na chen po zhes gsungs so //
translated: For that very reason, he is called the great one.

original: sgra che ba zhes pa ni dpal mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rgyud las gsungs te sgra yang de yin la che ba yang de nyid yin pas sgra che'o //
analyzed: sgra che ba zhes pa ni dpal mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rgyud las gsungs te sgra yang de yin la che ba yang de nyid yin pas sgra che'o //
translated: The great sound is from the glorious Tantra of Manifest Realization. It is a sound and it is great, so it is the great sound.

original: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud nyid las so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud nyid las so //

analyzed: 'jig rten gsum ni sa 'og dang sa bla dang sa stengs so //

analyzed: de la gcig pu gnyis su med pa'i sgra grag pa dang gang ldan pa de ni 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa'o //
translated: The one who has the sound of the single, nondual sound in those is the one sound in the three worlds.

original: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa //
translated: The sound that resounds to the end of space

original: zhes pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyud de nyid las te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyud de nyid las te /
translated: is from the very same Tantra of Noble Manjushri.

original: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gshin rje gshed la bka' stsal te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gshin rje gshed la bka' stsal te /

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i steng du sngags kyi tshul 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed des ri rab ri'i rtse mo de nyid la gnas te /
translated: for the sake of all sentient beings, Above the great trichiliocosm, teach the method of mantra with Manjushri, at that time, the Bhagavat Yamantaka, dwelling on the peak of Mount Meru,

analyzed: sgra chen po gcig kho na bsgrags par gyur te /

original: sgra gang gis nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa thos pa'i sgras yang dag par go bar byas te /
analyzed: sgra gang gis nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa thos pa'i sgras yang dag par go bar byas te /

original: de nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas gsungs pa /
translated: Then it is said:

analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs @69b pa ; / zhes so //
translated: The sound that resounds to the extent of space.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das de sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ces pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das de sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ces pa ste /

original: sgra de gang la yod pa gang yin pa de ni sgra dang ldan pa rnams te /
analyzed: sgra de gang la yod pa gang yin pa de ni sgra dang ldan pa rnams te /

analyzed: sgra dang gang ldan pa de rnams kyi nang na dam pa dang phul du byung ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that among those endowed with sound, he is the best and most excellent.

original: de nas da ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i spro ba'i cho ga bstan te /
analyzed: de nas da ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i spro ba'i cho ga bstan te /
translated: Now, the procedure for the emanation of the third wheel is taught.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge las /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge las /
translated: From the syllable in the heart of the gnosis being of all the TathƒÅgatas,

translated: The BhagavƒÅn Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, in order to guide those very sentient beings who engage in anger, visualizes the wrathful forms taught in the Yoga, Carya, and KriyƒÅ tantras and emanates them from his own body in order to subdue the three worlds.

original: smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod cing bsnyer ba'i dpral ba dang / 'jigs pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal dang ldan pa rnams rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa la sogs pa rdo rje 'bar ba'i me 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan gyis phyag mtshan pa rnam pa du ma'i mdog dang rgyan can cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'chang
analyzed: smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod cing bsnyer ba'i dpral ba dang / 'jigs pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal dang ldan pa rnams rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa la sogs pa rdo rje 'bar ba'i me 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan gyis phyag mtshan pa rnam pa du ma'i mdog dang rgyan can cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'chang
translated: They have foreheads wrinkled with the waves of wrathful frowns between their eyebrows, faces with terrifying bared fangs, and hands marked with vajras, hooks, lassos, and so forth, with blazing vajra fire. They have various colors and ornaments and wear various costumes.

original: ba'i khro bo'i sku rnam par phyung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gdug pa can thams cad gdul bar byas te /
analyzed: ba'i khro bo'i sku rnam par phyung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gdug pa can thams cad gdul bar byas te /
translated: Having emanated the forms of the wrathful ones, they tame all the wicked in all the world systems.

original: yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig rnams rang gi rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs rnams su gyur te ji lta ba'i rim pas yang dag par gnasüîΩpar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig rnams rang gi rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs rnams su gyur te ji lta ba'i rim pas yang dag par gnas par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, having returned, they become the seventy-one syllables of the name mantra in the colors and forms of their families on the second mandala outside the mandala of the vajra realm, and one should imagine that they are situated in their proper order.

original: de rnams rnam pa lngar bgos te /
analyzed: de rnams rnam pa lngar bgos te /
translated: Those are divided into five groups.

original: sangs rgyas h'um mdzad la sogs pa re re'i rigs la bcu bzhi bcu bzhi'i mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams byas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas h'um mdzad la sogs pa re re'i rigs la bcu bzhi bcu bzhi'i mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams byas te /

original: spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs mthun par mdzad nas /
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs mthun par mdzad nas /
translated: Having performed the emanation and gathering and so on in a similar way,

original: gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig tu bdag nyid mos pas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag ste /
analyzed: gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig tu bdag nyid mos pas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag ste /
translated: one should read the recitation of the names of Ma√±juvajra by oneself with devotion in the syllables of the name mantra in the order as previously stated.

original: yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rnam pa 'thob po zhes man ngag go //
analyzed: yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rnam pa 'thob po zhes man ngag go //
translated: One attains the form of the infinite collection of good qualities. This is the esoteric instruction.

original: tshigs bcad 'di ni tshig rkang gcig gis lhag pa'i bcu tham pa'o //
analyzed: tshigs bcad 'di ni tshig rkang gcig gis lhag pa'i bcu tham pa'o //
translated: This verse is the tenth, with one line remaining.

original: mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge ni bdun cu rtsa gcig gi mtshan yin no //üîΩ'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa mtshan gsang @70a * //
analyzed: mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge ni bdun cu rtsa gcig gi mtshan yin no // 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa mtshan gsang @70a * //
translated: The mantra syllables of the name are the name of the seventy-one.

original: sngags kyi don du rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba las me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis bstod pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas pa ste bdun pa'o /
analyzed: sngags kyi don du rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba las me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis bstod pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas pa ste bdun pa'o /
translated: From the commentary on the Noble One's True Names, called the Mirror of the Meaning of the Secret Mantras, the seventh chapter is done, from the perspective of the stages of praise with the nature of the mirror-like wisdom.

original: // / da ni so sor kun du rtog ba'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i bstod pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / da ni so sor kun du rtog ba'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i bstod pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, from the perspective of the individually discriminating wisdom, the praise of the BhagavƒÅn, the wisdom body, the bodhisattva of wisdom Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, is stated:

original: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
translated: The true absence of self, suchness,

original: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //
translated: The perfect end, without syllables.

original: ces pa ni /
analyzed: ces pa ni /
translated: This is stated.

original: de la de bzhin nyid ni rang bzhin gyis gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: de la de bzhin nyid ni rang bzhin gyis gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba ste /
translated: Suchness is free from the aspects of apprehended object, etc.

original: shes pa dang shes pa ma yin pa'i gnas skabs gnyis la mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa dang shes pa ma yin pa'i gnas skabs gnyis la mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because its nature is the same in both the states of consciousness and non-consciousness.

original: de nyid ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mchog ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mchog ste /
translated: That itself is the limit of reality, the supreme,

analyzed: tshad ma thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i phyir dang / bdag la sogs par rtog pa yang rtogs par gnod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not deceived by any valid cognition, and because it is not harmed by the realization of the conception of self, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' ni phung po la sogs pa'i bdag la sogs par nye bar mi dmigs pa kho nas mchog tu tshad ma nyid kyis nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' ni phung po la sogs pa'i bdag la sogs par nye bar mi dmigs pa kho nas mchog tu tshad ma nyid kyis nye bar bstan to //
translated: Therefore, Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, the wisdom being of all tathƒÅgatas is taught to be supreme by valid cognition itself, solely by not observing a self in the aggregates, etc.

original: yang dag ni bden pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / rtogs pa med pa tsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag ni bden pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / rtogs pa med pa tsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is real because of truth, suchness, and mere non-realization.

original: 'di ltar gal te bdag la sogs pa'i dngos po med na chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ci yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te bdag la sogs pa'i dngos po med na chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ci yin /
translated: Thus, if things such as the self do not exist, one should not doubt what the nature of phenomena is,

original: 'bras bu ni gang yin zhes the tshom za bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni gang yin zhes the tshom za bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: or what their result is.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di kho na chos dang gang zag la sogs pa nyid kyis rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / rnam par rtog pa can gyi bdag gis so sor snang ba'i chos thams cad kyi khams su gyur pa don dam pa can gyi g-yo ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di kho na chos dang gang zag la sogs pa nyid kyis rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / rnam par rtog pa can gyi bdag gis so sor snang ba'i chos thams cad kyi khams su gyur pa don dam pa can gyi g-yo ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Because this is the sole characteristic of the emptiness of all phenomena, such as persons, and so on, and it is the ultimate nature of all phenomena that appear individually to the conceptual mind.

analyzed: 'bras bu'i chos stobs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi'ang rgyu de nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is also the cause of the phenomena that are results, such as the powers and so on.

original: de'i lam gyi chos rnams kyang rgyu dang khams te /
analyzed: de'i lam gyi chos rnams kyang rgyu dang khams te /
translated: The phenomena that are the path are also the cause and the element.

original: de'i phyir na bdag med pa ni chos kyi dbyings zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir na bdag med pa ni chos kyi dbyings zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that selflessness is the realm of phenomena.

original: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid la sogs pa 'di dag rnams ni me long lta bu'i ye shes chos rnams kyi sgo ste ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid la sogs pa 'di dag rnams ni me long lta bu'i ye shes chos rnams kyi sgo ste ;
translated: Because these suchnesses and so forth are the doors of the mirrorlike wisdom of phenomena.

original: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi byed pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug cing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi byed pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug cing /
translated: Because by way of the function of suchness, one enters into the nature of all phenomena.

original: de yang stobs rnams rab tu byung bas me long lta bu'i ye shes ni yang dag mtha' ste zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de yang stobs rnams rab tu byung bas me long lta bu'i ye shes ni yang dag mtha' ste zhes gsungs te /
translated: And because the strengths are fully arisen, mirrorlike wisdom is the perfect end.

original: de rtogs pa'i phul du byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i phul du byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the best realization of that.üîΩTherefore, the four of them are the four characteristics of mirrorlike wisdom, the wisdom of equality, discerning wisdom, and all-accomplishing wisdom.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na de rnams bzhi ni me long lta bu'i ye @70b shes dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor kun du rtog pa dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi mtshan nyid bzhi po 'di rnams gang dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal de ni /üîΩyang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na de rnams bzhi ni me long lta bu'i ye @70b shes dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor kun du rtog pa dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi mtshan nyid bzhi po 'di rnams gang dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal de ni / yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
translated: The Bhagavat Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, who possesses these,üîΩis the perfect lack of self, suchness,

original: yang dag mtha' ste zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' ste zhes gsungs so //
translated: and the perfect end.

original: yi ge med ni rnams grangs gzhan gyis 'gyur ba med pas na mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: yi ge med ni rnams grangs gzhan gyis 'gyur ba med pas na mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The ‚Äúunwritten‚Äù is unchanging, because it does not change into other enumerations.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the reality of the ultimate realm.

original: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //üîΩzab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrog pa //
analyzed: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste // zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrog pa //
translated: The supreme leader of those who proclaim emptiness,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: he proclaims the sound of the profound and the vast.

original: de la stong pa nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ni stong pa nyid rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de la stong pa nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ni stong pa nyid rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The supreme leader of those who proclaim emptiness is the three kinds of emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / de'i dngos po ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / de'i dngos po ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: They are the emptiness of non-things, the emptiness of the non-entityness of things, and the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni kun brtags kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni kun brtags kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-things is the imagined characteristic.
