original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang don la //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang don la //
translated: But in the omniscient one,

original: 'phro ba'o zhes na bcom ma min //
analyzed: 'phro ba'o zhes na bcom ma min //
translated: it is said to be indestructible.

original: zhes so // 'jam dpal yang thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'dzin pa dang ldan pas na mchog tu yid gcugs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes so // 'jam dpal yang thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'dzin pa dang ldan pas na mchog tu yid gcugs pa ste /
translated: Manjusri is supremely trustworthy because he is endowed with the special knowledge of the bodhisattva.

original: de gang la yod pa de gcugs pa dang ldan zhes bya'o //üîΩgrol pa thar pa rnam grol lus //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de gcugs pa dang ldan zhes bya'o // grol pa thar pa rnam grol lus //
translated: He who has that is said to be endowed with trust.üîΩLiberation, freedom, liberation-body,

original: rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid //
analyzed: rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid //
translated: liberation, peace, and peacefulness.

original: ces pa ni de la grol ba ni stong pa mthong ba'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni de la grol ba ni stong pa mthong ba'o //
translated: Liberation is the vision of emptiness.

original: de ltar yab chos kyi grags pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yab chos kyi grags pas gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said by the father, Dharmakirti:

original: stong nyid mthong ba grol ba yin //
analyzed: stong nyid mthong ba grol ba yin //
translated: The vision of emptiness is liberation.

original: bsgom pa ma lus de yi don //
analyzed: bsgom pa ma lus de yi don //
translated: The meaning of all meditation is that.

original: zhes so // de yang bcom ldan 'das kho na grol ba ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de yang bcom ldan 'das kho na grol ba ste /
translated: And that liberation is of the Lord alone,

original: stong pa nyid rnam par dbye ba las 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid rnam par dbye ba las 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the analysis of emptiness.

original: thar pa ni chags pa dang bral ba nyid la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa de'i don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa skye @79a * //
analyzed: thar pa ni chags pa dang bral ba nyid la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa de'i don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa skye @79a * //
translated: Freedom is the yogi who has entered into freedom from attachment, and in him arises the analytical knowledge of meaning and the analytical knowledge of phenomena.

original: ba na rab tu mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa 'byung zhing yid dga' ba'i lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba na rab tu mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa 'byung zhing yid dga' ba'i lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and he becomes happy, joyful, and content. He experiences physical serenity, and his mind becomes happy.

original: lus shin tu sbyangs pas bde ba tshor ro //
analyzed: lus shin tu sbyangs pas bde ba tshor ro //
translated: Because of physical serenity, he experiences pleasure.

original: bde bar gyur pa'i sems mnyam par 'jig go //üîΩmnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing /
analyzed: bde bar gyur pa'i sems mnyam par 'jig go // mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing /
translated: With a mind that is pleased, he becomes concentrated.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo //
translated: With a concentrated mind, he knows and sees things as they really are.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong nas yid 'byung ngo //üîΩyid byung ngo //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong nas yid 'byung ngo // yid byung ngo //
translated: Knowing and seeing things as they really are, he becomes disenchanted.

original: yid byung bas chags pa dang bral lo //
analyzed: yid byung bas chags pa dang bral lo //
translated: Being disenchanted, he becomes dispassionate.üîΩBeing dispassionate, he is liberated.

original: chags pa dang bral nas rnam par grol ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par grol ba'i sems nyid cher gzhag ste /
analyzed: chags pa dang bral nas rnam par grol ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par grol ba'i sems nyid cher gzhag ste /

original: de yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And he has seen it.

original: de ltar gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar gsungs pa /
translated: This is what was said.

original: bying ba med pa'i lus kyis ni //
analyzed: bying ba med pa'i lus kyis ni //
translated: With a body free of dullness,

original: tshor ba sta gon gnas par bya //
analyzed: tshor ba sta gon gnas par bya //
translated: one should be ready for feeling.

original: mar me 'dra bar mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: mar me 'dra bar mya ngan 'das //
translated: Like a lamp, one should be ready for nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: de yi sems ni rnam par thar //
analyzed: de yi sems ni rnam par thar //
translated: One‚Äôs mind is liberated.

original: zhes so // slob dpon ka ma la tsaryas kyang gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // slob dpon ka ma la tsaryas kyang gsungs pa /
translated: The master Kamala≈õƒ´la also says:

original: 'dod chags la sogs bskor sems ni /üîΩ'khor ba'o de la chags bral ba //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs bskor sems ni / 'khor ba'o de la chags bral ba //
translated: The mind that is turned away from desire and so onüîΩis sa·πÉsƒÅra. The mind free from attachment to that

original: sgrib med sems ni thar pa ste //
analyzed: sgrib med sems ni thar pa ste //
translated: is nirvƒÅ·πáa. The mind free from obscurations is liberation.

original: mdor bsdus nas ni rgyal bas bshad //
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas ni rgyal bas bshad //
translated: In brief, this is what the Victor taught.

original: ces so // de lta bu'i tshul gyis nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pa la bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: ces so // de lta bu'i tshul gyis nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pa la bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: In this way, the BhagavƒÅn is posited in the vehicles of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and so on.

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal nyid du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal nyid du rig par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, he should be known as Ma√±juvajra,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de'i yin pa'i phyir ro // grol yan lag ni rnam par thar pa'i yan lag rnams ni grol yan lag ste /
translated: because all tathƒÅgatas are his.üîΩThe limbs of liberation are the limbs of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa ni byang chub po //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa ni byang chub po //
translated: Liberation is awakening.

original: de'i yan lag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad rnams so //
analyzed: de'i yan lag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad rnams so //

original: ji ltar gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar gsungs pa /

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
translated: the factor of perfect pliancy of enlightenment,üîΩthe factor of perfect concentration of enlightenment,

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib @79b pa'i gnyen po'i dngos po de rnams las gzhan shes bya'i sgrib pa 'joms pa'i don du bsgom pa'i lam rab tu goms pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po rnams so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib @79b pa'i gnyen po'i dngos po de rnams las gzhan shes bya'i sgrib pa 'joms pa'i don du bsgom pa'i lam rab tu goms pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po rnams so //
translated: The eightfold noble path is the path of cultivation, which is cultivated for the purpose of overcoming the obscurations to omniscience, which are different from those things that are the antidotes to the afflictive obstructions.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams te /

original: 'di ltar de dag ni mthong ba'i lam dang / bsgom pa'i lam la rnam par thar pa byang chub kyi yan lag rnams te /

original: kha cig tu bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal de grol yan lag ces gsungs so //
analyzed: kha cig tu bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal de grol yan lag ces gsungs so //
translated: In some places, the BhagavƒÅn has called Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ ‚ÄúVimukti¬≠j√±ƒÅna¬≠ke≈õari‚Äù (Lion of Liberation and Awareness).

original: de gnyis su de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis su de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: rnam grol ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bcings pa las so //
analyzed: rnam grol ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bcings pa las so //
translated: Liberation is from the bondage of attachment and so on.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: bcings pa ni gsum ste /
analyzed: bcings pa ni gsum ste /

original: 'dod chags kyis 'ching ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'ching ba dang / gti mug gis 'ching ba'o //

analyzed: de rnams kyis bcings pas khams gsum las mi 'da' ba'i phyir na 'ching ba rnams te /

original: rnam par grol bar byed pas na rnam grol zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam par grol bar byed pas na rnam grol zhes gsungs so //

original: de ltar yang 'dir yon tan phyi nas gsungs pa /

translated: Peace is the cessation of the eight abodes of conflict and so on. It is the pacification of all elaborations that is the characteristic of dependent origination.

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir na zhi ba zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: rtag pa med pa chad med pa // thad da don med don gcig min //

translated: The pacification of all mental proliferation,üîΩThe pacification

original: par nges 'byung mthar 'gro ba //
analyzed: par nges 'byung mthar 'gro ba //
translated: Nirvana is the final goal of renunciation.

original: bde sdug mthar byed mthar thug pa //
analyzed: bde sdug mthar byed mthar thug pa //

original: chags bral lus ni zad pa po //
analyzed: chags bral lus ni zad pa po //
translated: It is the exhaustion of the body free from attachment.

original: zhes pa ni de la mya ngan las 'das pa ni mdor bstan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la mya ngan las 'das pa ni mdor bstan pa ste /
translated: Here, nirvana is taught in brief.

analyzed: lhag ma'i tshigs bcad rnams ni rigs kyi dbye bas de'i rnam par bshad do //
translated: The remaining verses are its explanation, classified by type.

original: rin po che'i phreng ba las mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i phreng ba las mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /

original: yod pa'ang mya ngan las 'das min //
analyzed: yod pa'ang mya ngan las 'das min //
translated: Nirvana is not existence.

original: med pa nyid lta ga la yin //
analyzed: med pa nyid lta ga la yin //

analyzed: dngos po dngos med mchog 'dzin pa'i // zad pa mya ngan med par gsungs //
translated: The exhaustion of the conception of things and nonthingsüîΩis taught to be nirvana.

original: mya ngan ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: mya ngan ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: Nirvana is the exhaustion of suffering.

original: de'ang phyi rol pa rnams kyis te //
analyzed: de'ang phyi rol pa rnams kyis te //
translated: The non-Buddhists

original: de rnams kyis de rtsam la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyis de rtsam la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: take that to be an object of observation.

original: zhi ba ni zhi ba nyid pas zhi ste /
analyzed: zhi ba ni zhi ba nyid pas zhi ste /
translated: Peace is peace itself.

original: de ni nyan thos pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de ni nyan thos pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: That is the nirvana of the ≈õrƒÅvakas.

original: legs par nges par 'byung ni legs par nges par 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: legs par nges par 'byung ni legs par nges par 'byung ba ste /
translated: Excellent renunciation is excellent renunciation.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o //
translated: The buddhas.

original: mthar 'gro ba ni mtha' ste /üîΩrnam par 'jig par 'gro zhing 'gyur bas na mthar 'gro ba ni mi bskyod pa ste ;
analyzed: mthar 'gro ba ni mtha' ste / rnam par 'jig par 'gro zhing 'gyur bas na mthar 'gro ba ni mi bskyod pa ste ;
translated: The end is the limit.

original: / zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams rang gi rnam par sgo nas yang dag par spyod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: / zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams rang gi rnam par sgo nas yang dag par spyod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The end-goer is Akshobhya, because he goes to the end, to destruction, to change, and because he is the true goer in his own aspect, since he is the aspect of anger.

original: bde sdug mthar byed ni chen 'byung ldan te /
analyzed: bde sdug mthar byed ni chen 'byung ldan te /
translated: The end-maker of happiness and suffering is Amitabha,

original: ser sna la spyod pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pa rnam par dag par tu sbyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis de rnams kyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal mthar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ser sna la spyod pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pa rnam par dag par tu sbyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis de rnams kyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal mthar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is the end-maker of the happiness and suffering of those beings who engage in miserliness, by means of his pure generosity, since he is the nature of generosity.

original: mthar thug pa ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
analyzed: mthar thug pa ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
translated: The ultimate is Amoghasiddhi,

original: 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid rab tu bstan pa'i sgo nas so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes mthar thug par son pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid rab tu bstan pa'i sgo nas so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes mthar thug par son pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is the ultimate of discernment wisdom, since he teaches the reality of pure desire to those beings who engage in desire.

original: chags bral ni don yod grub pa ste /
analyzed: chags bral ni don yod grub pa ste /
translated: The detached one is Amoghasiddhi,üîΩbecause he is the detached one, since he is the aspect of jealousy.

original: le lo la spyod pa'i sems can rnams rang gi rnam par thar pa'i gzugs kyis de rnams la chags pa dang bral ba bskyed nas dge ba'i phyogs la sems nges par sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: le lo la spyod pa'i sems can rnams rang gi rnam par thar pa'i gzugs kyis de rnams la chags pa dang bral ba bskyed nas dge ba'i phyogs la sems nges par sbyor ba ste /
translated: Those sentient beings who are lazy, by means of his own liberated form, he generates in them the desire to be free from attachment, and he causes their minds to be definitely fixed on virtue.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam rab tu sten par byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩlus ni zad pa po ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam rab tu sten par byed pa'i phyir ro // lus ni zad pa po ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: Because he causes them to rely on the path to nirvana.üîΩThe body is the exhausted one, i.e., Vairocana.

original: lus ni bag chags so //
analyzed: lus ni bag chags so //
translated: The body is the latent tendency.

original: de'i zad pa ni rnam par 'jig par byed ste /
analyzed: de'i zad pa ni rnam par 'jig par byed ste /
translated: Its exhaustion is its destruction.

original: gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba'i chos bstan pa'i sgo na shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba'i chos bstan pa'i sgo na shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those sentient beings who are addicted to delusion, by means of the door of teaching the Dharma just as it is, he illuminates the pristine wisdom of the extremely pure realm of truth.

original: de yang thar pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang thar pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Moreover, liberation is twofold:

original: phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / @80b phung po lhag ma med pa'o //
analyzed: phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / @80b phung po lhag ma med pa'o //
translated: with a remainder of the aggregates and without a remainder of the aggregates.

original: de la phyi ba la sogs pa rnams kyis lhag ma dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de la phyi ba la sogs pa rnams kyis lhag ma dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Among them, the Vaibhashikas and so forth have the one with a remainder of the aggregates.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni lhag ma med pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni lhag ma med pa'o //
translated: The perfect, complete Buddha has no remainder.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na gsungs pa //üîΩbag chag bcas pa'i skyon rnams te //üîΩskyo ba khyod kyi skyon rnams ni //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na gsungs pa // bag chag bcas pa'i skyon rnams te // skyo ba khyod kyi skyon rnams ni //
translated: Therefore it is said:üîΩThe faults with their habitual tendencies,üîΩyou are free of all faults,

original: bag chags bcas par gcig mi mnga' //
analyzed: bag chags bcas par gcig mi mnga' //
translated: and also of their habitual tendencies.üîΩTherefore, you have two kinds of nirvana,

original: de'i phyir mya ngan 'das gnyis dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de nyid do //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir mya ngan 'das gnyis dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de nyid do // zhes gsungs so //
translated: and also your own nature.

original: de gnyis ka'i rang bzhin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal nyid par bya'o //
analyzed: de gnyis ka'i rang bzhin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal nyid par bya'o //
translated: You should understand that the nature of both of these is the Blessed One, Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: de'i phyir na gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir na gsungs te /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Nirvana, etc.

original: tshugs pa med pa dpe med pa //
analyzed: tshugs pa med pa dpe med pa //
translated: Unassailable, incomparable,

original: mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min //
analyzed: mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min //
translated: not manifest, not shining, not illuminating,

original: zhes pa ni de la tshugs pa med pa ni gzhan rnams kyis dbang bya bar mi nus pas na tshugs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la tshugs pa med pa ni gzhan rnams kyis dbang bya bar mi nus pas na tshugs pa med pa'o //
translated: Unassailable means that it cannot be overcome by others, so it is unassailable.

original: dpe med pa ni dpe thams cad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe med pa ni dpe thams cad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Incomparable means that it is beyond all examples.

original: mi mngon pa ni bud med la sogs pa'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mngon pa ni bud med la sogs pa'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not manifest because it is devoid of the form of a woman, and so on.

original: mi snang ba ni snang ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi snang ba ni snang ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not visible because it is free from appearance.

original: gsal byed mi ni gos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal byed mi ni gos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a manifestor because it is free from contact.

original: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de nyid don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir na khyad par gyi tshig ldas bzung ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de nyid don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir na khyad par gyi tshig ldas bzung ba'o //
translated: And because the Blessed One is the nature of ultimate reality, he is referred to by the ten terms that express his distinctive attributes.

original: mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po //
analyzed: mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po //
translated: He is immutable, omnipresent, and pervasive.

original: phra zhes zhag med sa bon bral //
analyzed: phra zhes zhag med sa bon bral //
translated: He is subtle, free from stains, and seedless.

original: zhes pa ni de la mi 'gyur ba ni 'gyur ba dang bral pa'i phyi ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la mi 'gyur ba ni 'gyur ba dang bral pa'i phyi ro //
translated: Here, he is immutable because he is free from change.

original: kun 'gro ni thams cad du song ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun 'gro ni thams cad du song ba'i phyir ro //
translated: He is omnipresent because he pervades everything.

original: khyab pa ni g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba'i don gyi rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa ni g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba'i don gyi rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
translated: He is pervasive because he is the nature of all things, both animate and inanimate.

original: rngul phran ni phra ba'i phyir na phra zhing ngo //
analyzed: rngul phran ni phra ba'i phyir na phra zhing ngo //
translated: He is subtle because he is subtle, being free from grossness.

original: zhag med ni lam gyi bde na pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhag med ni lam gyi bde na pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
translated: He is free from stains because he is the nature of the bliss of the path.

original: yang na 'dus ma byas pa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na 'dus ma byas pa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
translated: Or, he is free from stains because he is the nature of the four unconditioned things.

original: de rnam pa bzhi ni nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang // so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang / de bzhi nyid do //
analyzed: de rnam pa bzhi ni nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang // so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang / de bzhi nyid do //
translated: These four are space, analytical cessation, non-analytical cessation, and the cessation not due to deliberation.

original: sa bon ni chos dang chos ma yin pa dang mi g-yo ba'i sa bon bas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: sa bon ni chos dang chos ma yin pa dang mi g-yo ba'i sa bon bas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The seed is the store-consciousness, because it is the seed of all dharmas, of good, bad, and neutral dharmas.

original: de nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is the nature of the Lord, because it is the nature of the Lord.

original: rngul med rngul bral dri ma med //
analyzed: rngul med rngul bral dri ma med //
translated: It is without sweat, free from sweat, and stainless.

original: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
analyzed: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
translated: It is free from faults, and is faultless.

original: zhes pa ni de la rngul med ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rngul dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la rngul med ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rngul dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is without sweat, because it is free from the sweat of passion, etc.

original: rdul bral ni de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa las gzhan du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul bral ni de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa las gzhan du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is free from dust, because suchness is not otherwise.

original: dri ma med ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dri ma ni glo bur ba'i phyir na /üîΩbcom @81a * //
analyzed: dri ma med ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dri ma ni glo bur ba'i phyir na / bcom @81a * //
translated: It is stainless, because the stain of all dharmas is adventitious.

original: ldan 'das de nyid dri ma dang bral ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ldan 'das de nyid dri ma dang bral ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: The Lord himself is said to be free from stain.üîΩIt is the abode of the Dharma, and is the Dharma itself.

original: nyes pa spangs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa gang gis bor ba de ni nyes pa spangs pa ste /
analyzed: nyes pa spangs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa gang gis bor ba de ni nyes pa spangs pa ste /
translated: The one who has abandoned faults is the one who has abandoned the faults of attachment and so on.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na skyon med pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na skyon med pa zhes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, he is the one without faults.

original: skyon nad las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni skyon med pa'o //
analyzed: skyon nad las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni skyon med pa'o //
translated: The one who is beyond faults and sicknesses is the one without faults.

original: de 'dra ba'i yon tan gyi don khyad par can yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i yon tan gyi don khyad par can yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
translated: The one who has such special qualities is also the BhagavƒÅn.üîΩThe one who is the master of awakening for those who are fully awakened,

original: shin tu sad pa rnams sad bdag / kun shes kun rig dam pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu sad pa rnams sad bdag / kun shes kun rig dam pa'o //
translated: the one who is the best of all knowers and all seers.

original: zhes pa ni de la kun shes pa ni shin tu legs shing phul du byung bas shin tu sad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la kun shes pa ni shin tu legs shing phul du byung bas shin tu sad pa ste /
translated: Here, the one who is fully awakened is the one who is fully awakened in the best and most excellent way.

original: ji bzhin du gnas pa'i dngos po phyin ci ma log par mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji bzhin du gnas pa'i dngos po phyin ci ma log par mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he knows things as they are without error.

original: rnam sad bdag ni nyan thos la sogs pa las khyad par du sad pa ni sad pa ste /
analyzed: rnam sad bdag ni nyan thos la sogs pa las khyad par du sad pa ni sad pa ste /
translated: The one who is the master of awakening is the one who is awakened in a way that is special compared to the ≈õrƒÅvakas and so on.

original: de'i bdag nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: His nature is emptiness.

original: de nyid gang dang gang ldan pa de rnams sad pa'i bdag go //
analyzed: de nyid gang dang gang ldan pa de rnams sad pa'i bdag go //
translated: The one who possesses that is the master of awakening.

original: kun shes ni kun te ma lus pa'i shes bya mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir na kun shes so //
analyzed: kun shes ni kun te ma lus pa'i shes bya mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir na kun shes so //
translated: He is omniscient because he knows all objects of knowledge, that is, everything.

original: kun rig ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa bsam pa dang bag la nyal rig pas na kun rig ste /
analyzed: kun rig ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa bsam pa dang bag la nyal rig pas na kun rig ste /
translated: He is all-knowing because he knows the mental behavior, thoughts, and dispositions of all sentient beings.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na dam pa po ni rab ste bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na dam pa po ni rab ste bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
translated: Therefore, he is the supreme, that is, the Blessed One himself.

original: rnam par shes pa chos dbyings 'das //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa chos dbyings 'das //
translated: Consciousness transcends the dharmadhatu.

original: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
analyzed: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
translated: He holds the mode of nondual wisdom.

original: zhes pa ni de la rnam par shes pa chos nyid 'das ni rnam par shes pa ni mig la sogs pa ma gtogs pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yod de /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la rnam par shes pa chos nyid 'das ni rnam par shes pa ni mig la sogs pa ma gtogs pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yod de /
translated: Consciousness transcends the dharmadhatu means that consciousness is the foundation consciousness, apart from the eye and so on.

original: de nyid kyang sa bon thams cad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid kyang sa bon thams cad pa yin gyi /
translated: It is also the seed of everything.

original: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the consciousnesses of the eye and so on.

original: de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: How is that known?

original: lung dang rigs pas so //
analyzed: lung dang rigs pas so //
translated: From scripture and reasoning.

original: de la rigs pa ni sgo du mas rgyas pa dang bcas pa bsgrubs pas 'dir ma bris so //
analyzed: de la rigs pa ni sgo du mas rgyas pa dang bcas pa bsgrubs pas 'dir ma bris so //
translated: As for reasoning, since it is established in many ways, it is not written here.

original: lung la ni rtsod pa'i gzhi dang bral ba'i phyir dang / tshig nyung ba nyid kyi phyir yang brjod do //
analyzed: lung la ni rtsod pa'i gzhi dang bral ba'i phyir dang / tshig nyung ba nyid kyi phyir yang brjod do //
translated: It is also mentioned in the scriptures because it is free from the basis of dispute and because of its brevity.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de yang chos mngon pa'i mdo las /
analyzed: de yang chos mngon pa'i mdo las /
translated: And in the Abhidharma S≈´tra:

original: thog ma med pa dus kyi dbyings //
analyzed: thog ma med pa dus kyi dbyings //
translated: The realm without beginning or end

original: chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te //
translated: Is the abode of all dharmas.üîΩBecause of its existence, all beings

original: de yod pas na 'gro kun dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang thob pa yin //
analyzed: de yod pas na 'gro kun dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang thob pa yin //
translated: Attain nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: zhes so / de'i chos nyid ni rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid do //
analyzed: zhes so / de'i chos nyid ni rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid do //
translated: Its reality is the reality of consciousness.

original: de yis 'das pa ni 'das pa ste /
analyzed: de yis 'das pa ni 'das pa ste /
translated: That which has passed beyond is past.

original: de yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because it is not an object of apprehension.

original: ye shes ni thams cad du yang bdag por bsgoms pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa chos nyid las te /
analyzed: ye shes ni thams cad du yang bdag por bsgoms pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa chos nyid las te /
translated: Wisdom is extremely pure from reality because it is cultivated everywhere as the lord.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na gnyis med tshul 'chang ba zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na gnyis med tshul 'chang ba zhes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called ‚Äúendowed with the mode of nonduality‚Äù

original: zab cing rgya che ba'i bdag @81b nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zab cing rgya che ba'i bdag @81b nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of its nature of profundity and vastness.

original: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
translated: It is nonconceptual and spontaneous,

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas don byed pa //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas don byed pa //
translated: Acting for the sake of the buddhas of the three times.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This isüîΩbecause, ultimately, the Bhagavat is not conceptualized as conceptual or

original: de la rnam par rtog med ni don dam par rnam par rtog pa la yang mi rtog pa la yang mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog med ni don dam par rnam par rtog pa la yang mi rtog pa la yang mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: nonconceptual.

original: de ltar yang gsungs pa /üîΩdon dam pa yi rnam rtog la'ang //
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs pa / don dam pa yi rnam rtog la'ang //
translated: Thus it is said:üîΩThe wise are never attached

original: mkhas pas rtag tu bying mi byed //üîΩdge ba dang yang mi dge ba'i //
analyzed: mkhas pas rtag tu bying mi byed // dge ba dang yang mi dge ba'i //
translated: to the ultimate, even conceptually.üîΩWhat difference is there

original: rnam par rtog la dbyer ci yod //
analyzed: rnam par rtog la dbyer ci yod //
translated: between virtuous and nonvirtuous conceptualization?

original: ces so // de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das de nyid rnam par rtog med do //
analyzed: ces so // de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das de nyid rnam par rtog med do //
translated: Therefore, the Bhagavat is nonconceptual.

original: lhun gyis grub ni mngon par 'du byed pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub ni mngon par 'du byed pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Spontaneously present means that he is without manifest activity.

original: rtsol ba dang bral bas na lhun gyis grub pa ste /
analyzed: rtsol ba dang bral bas na lhun gyis grub pa ste /
translated: He is spontaneously present because he is free from effort.

original: de yang don 'dir 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang don 'dir 'gyur te /
translated: This is the meaning here.

original: sngon gyi dus na mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i 'jug pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu dpyad pas smon lam gang yin pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du rtog pa med na yang mnyam par skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don
analyzed: sngon gyi dus na mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i 'jug pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu dpyad pas smon lam gang yin pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du rtog pa med na yang mnyam par skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don
translated: By the wisdom of engagement that is accompanied by prior application, one thoroughly investigates the prayers that one has made in the past, thinking, ‚ÄúMay I act in the future for the sake of sentient beings in accordance with their fortune, just as if I were a wish-fulfilling gem, even though I am free of conceptual thought.‚Äù

original: phyis byed par gyur cig ces gang sngon gyi smon lam 'debs pa des mngon par 'dod pas 'phags pa rtag tu 'jug pa lhun gyis grub pa nan tan med pas gzhan gyi don bya ba dang gang ldan pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
analyzed: phyis byed par gyur cig ces gang sngon gyi smon lam 'debs pa des mngon par 'dod pas 'phags pa rtag tu 'jug pa lhun gyis grub pa nan tan med pas gzhan gyi don bya ba dang gang ldan pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
translated: The Blessed One is endowed with the spontaneous, constant engagement of the noble ones, which is free of effort, and which acts for the sake of others in accordance with the prayers that he made in the past.

original: kyi sku thams cad lhun gyis grub pa gsungs so //
analyzed: kyi sku thams cad lhun gyis grub pa gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One is said to be the body of gnosis of all the TathƒÅgatas, which is spontaneous.

original: tshig de gnyis kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshig de gnyis kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By these two phrases, the Blessed One is said to be the embodiment of method and wisdom.

original: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'phangs rtag tu ni //
analyzed: sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'phangs rtag tu ni //
translated: Constantly impelled by his former prayers,

original: lhun gyis grub pas gzhan gyi don rnams 'byung //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pas gzhan gyi don rnams 'byung //
translated: And the benefit of others arises spontaneously.

original: zhes so // dus gsum sangs rgyas don byed pa ni dus gsum gyi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dus gsum sangs rgyas te //
analyzed: zhes so // dus gsum sangs rgyas don byed pa ni dus gsum gyi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dus gsum sangs rgyas te //
translated: The buddhas of the three times are the buddhas of the three times.

original: bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //üîΩsangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de nyid do // sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
translated: The Bhagavat is just that.üîΩThe Buddha has no beginning or end.

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
translated: The primordial Buddha has no cause.

original: zhes pa ni de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la 'on te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la 'on te /
translated: Here, what is called ‚ÄúBuddha‚Äù is this.

original: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar na sangs rgyas la 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar na sangs rgyas la 'jug par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does the term ‚ÄúBuddha‚Äù apply to the Buddha?

original: ci ste mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste mi 'gyur te /
translated: If you ask this, how could it not apply?

original: sangs rgyas ni ye shes kyi don nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni ye shes kyi don nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning of ‚ÄúBuddha‚Äù is just the meaning of ‚Äúwisdom.‚Äù

original: de yang gcig nyid kyis dngos po dang las gnyis su sbyor ba mthong ngo //
analyzed: de yang gcig nyid kyis dngos po dang las gnyis su sbyor ba mthong ngo //
translated: And that is seen to be applied to both a thing and an action by the same word.

original: lha sbyin sangs rgyas la rag las par gyur to //
analyzed: lha sbyin sangs rgyas la rag las par gyur to //
translated: Devadatta is dependent on the Buddha.

original: lha sbyin gyis sangs rgyas bstan zhing bcos so //
analyzed: lha sbyin gyis sangs rgyas bstan zhing bcos so //
translated: Devadatta teaches and makes the Buddha.

original: las su yang sangs rgyas kyi dgrar 'dod de /
analyzed: las su yang sangs rgyas kyi dgrar 'dod de /
translated: And the Buddha is also asserted to be the action of the enemy.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas dang ldan no //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas dang ldan no //
translated: This is the Buddha.

original: las thams cad ces bya bas na sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: las thams cad ces bya bas na sangs rgyas te /
translated: Since it is the agent of all actions, it is the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas 'di ni dngos po thams cad shes pa'i blo dang gang ldan @82a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'di ni dngos po thams cad shes pa'i blo dang gang ldan @82a * //
translated: The Buddha is he who possesses the intellect that knows all things.

original: pa de'o // yi ge aa ni ldan pa'i don dang / phul du byung ba'i don to //
analyzed: pa de'o // yi ge aa ni ldan pa'i don dang / phul du byung ba'i don to //
translated: The letter A has the sense of possession and the sense of excellence.

original: yang na sangs rgyas ni thugs su chud pa'i don yin la phul du byung ba yang rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas ni thugs su chud pa'i don yin la phul du byung ba yang rtogs pa ste /
translated: Or else, the Buddha is the meaning of realization, and excellence is understanding.

original: rtogs pa'i don du yang gsungs so //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don du yang gsungs so //
translated: It is also said to be the meaning of understanding.

original: dngos po dang las dang byed par 'gyur ba las byed pa gang yin pa yang las thams cad de /
analyzed: dngos po dang las dang byed par 'gyur ba las byed pa gang yin pa yang las thams cad de /
translated: The agent of all actions is the agent of all actions that are to be done.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid shes pa dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid shes pa dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas te /
translated: The Buddha is he who possesses the knowledge of the specific and general characteristics.

original: bcom ldan 'das so /üîΩthog ma tha ma med pa ni thog ma dang tha ma ni thog ma dang tha ma gnyis so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das so / thog ma tha ma med pa ni thog ma dang tha ma ni thog ma dang tha ma gnyis so //
translated: The Blessed One.üîΩThe beginningless and endless are the two, beginning and end.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa gang dang ldan pa de thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa gang dang ldan pa de thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
translated: He who possesses the beginningless and endless is the beginningless and endless.

original: bcom ldan 'das de skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The Blessed One, because he is free from arising and ceasing.

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas ni dang po kho na'i sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas ni dang po kho na'i sangs rgyas te /
translated: The first Buddha is the Buddha of the very beginning.

original: de yang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //üîΩgal te ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do // gal te ji lta zhe na /
translated: And he is the nature of the five gnoses.üîΩIf it is asked, ‚ÄúHow is that?‚Äù

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: it is said:

original: stobs kyis rab tu bsgoms pa ni //
analyzed: stobs kyis rab tu bsgoms pa ni //
translated: The well-cultivated powers

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: are the mirror-like gnosis.

original: de la stobs ni lnga ste /
analyzed: de la stobs ni lnga ste /
translated: Therein, the powers are the five beginning with faith,

original: dad pa dang / dran pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis nye bar mtshon pa rnams te /
analyzed: dad pa dang / dran pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis nye bar mtshon pa rnams te /
translated: which are illustrated by faith, mindfulness, effort, samƒÅdhi, and wisdom.

original: de rnams kyis rab tu bsgoms pa nyid kyi phyir na yang dag pa'i mtha' thugs su chud pa'i phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis rab tu bsgoms pa nyid kyi phyir na yang dag pa'i mtha' thugs su chud pa'i phul du byung ba'o //
translated: Because they are well-cultivated, they are the best for realizing the limit of reality.

original: mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The characteristic of fearlessness is the gnosis of equality.

original: de la mi 'jigs pa rnams ni ye shes la mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / zag pa zad pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyu nye bar bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / rnam par byang pa'i rgyu bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa ste /
analyzed: de la mi 'jigs pa rnams ni ye shes la mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / zag pa zad pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyu nye bar bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / rnam par byang pa'i rgyu bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa ste /
translated: The fearlessnesses are the fearlessnesses with regard to knowledge, fearlessness with regard to declaring the obstructions, fearlessness with regard to declaring the causes of liberation, and fearlessness with regard to the path of definite emergence.

original: de bas na mi 'jigs pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na mi 'jigs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, they are fearlessnesses.

original: de bas na mi 'jigs pa bzhis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob bo //
analyzed: de bas na mi 'jigs pa bzhis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob bo //
translated: Therefore, through the four fearlessnesses, one attains the knowledge of equality.

original: kun du mtshan ma med pas shin tu phra ba'i rtogs pa rnam par dag pa de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: kun du mtshan ma med pas shin tu phra ba'i rtogs pa rnam par dag pa de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Because of the complete absence of signs, the knowledge of achieving the extremely subtle realization is pure. Therefore, the nature of the correct and discerning awareness is the knowledge of discernment.

original: de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa rnams kyi tshul gyis so //
analyzed: de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa rnams kyi tshul gyis so //
translated: Among them, the four correct and discerning awarenesses are with regard to meaning, phenomena, etymological definitions, and confidence.

original: de rnams kyis so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyis so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of them, one attains the knowledge of discernment.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi chos thams cad kyi snying po nyid lhag par mos pa'i bsam pa yang ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi chos thams cad kyi snying po nyid lhag par mos pa'i bsam pa yang ste /
translated: The intention of the conviction that the essence of all phenomena is the dharmadhatu.

original: de'i phyir snying rje chen po dang byams pa'i tshul ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i phyir snying rje chen po dang byams pa'i tshul ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
translated: The way of great compassion and love is the wisdom of purposeful activity.

original: bdag po thams cad shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: bdag po thams cad shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
translated: The knowledge of all lords is the wisdom of the extremely pure dharmadhatu.

original: @82b da ltar ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid dang / rigs lnga'i bdag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: @82b da ltar ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid dang / rigs lnga'i bdag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Thus, the Bhagavat has the nature of the five wisdoms and the nature of the five families.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo nas dmigs pa gcig pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo nas dmigs pa gcig pa nyid du blta bar bya'o //
translated: All phenomena should be seen as having a single reference point through their equality.

original: de 'ang 'jam dpal kho na ste /
analyzed: de 'ang 'jam dpal kho na ste /
translated: And that is Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ alone.

original: 'di ni rgyud med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyud med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is called ‚Äúwithout a continuum.‚Äù

original: rgyud ni rim pa ste /
analyzed: rgyud ni rim pa ste /
translated: A continuum is a sequence.

original: rgyud dang rim pa gang la med pa de ni rgyud med pa ste /
analyzed: rgyud dang rim pa gang la med pa de ni rgyud med pa ste /
translated: That which does not have a continuum or sequence is without a continuum.

original: skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not arise or cease.

original: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
analyzed: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
translated: The single eye of wisdom is stainless.

original: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The TathƒÅgata has a wisdom body.

original: zhes pa ni de la ye shes mig gcig ni ye shes nyid gcig pu'i mig dang gang ldan pa de ni ye shes mig gcig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la ye shes mig gcig ni ye shes nyid gcig pu'i mig dang gang ldan pa de ni ye shes mig gcig go //
translated: He is the one eye of wisdom.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na dri ma med ces pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na dri ma med ces pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, he is stainless,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is free from the stains of passion and so on.

original: ye shes lus can zhes pa ni ye shes nyid lus te /
analyzed: ye shes lus can zhes pa ni ye shes nyid lus te /
translated: He is the one whose body is wisdom,

original: gzugs la sogs pa med pa gang yin pa de /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa med pa gang yin pa de /
translated: because he is the one who has no form and so on.

original: ye shes lus can no //
analyzed: ye shes lus can no //
translated: He is the one whose body is wisdom.

original: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: He is the Tathagata.

original: de'i don ni bshad zin to //üîΩtshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che //üîΩsmra ba'i skye mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
analyzed: de'i don ni bshad zin to // tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che // smra ba'i skye mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
translated: The meaning of that has been explained.üîΩHe is the lord of speech, the great speaker,

original: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
analyzed: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
translated: the best of speakers, the victor of speakers,üîΩthe best of the best of speakers,

original: smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med //
analyzed: smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med //
translated: the lion of speakers, the unhindered.

original: ces pa ni de la tshig gi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i tshig brgyad po rnams kyis rgyu dang rgyu las byung ba can gyi dngos pos 'bras bu mchog tu yod pa la sogs pa bshad de /
analyzed: ces pa ni de la tshig gi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i tshig brgyad po rnams kyis rgyu dang rgyu las byung ba can gyi dngos pos 'bras bu mchog tu yod pa la sogs pa bshad de /
translated: Here, the eight terms beginning with the lord of speech are explained as the supreme result by way of the cause and the effect of that cause.

original: de yang gsungs pa tshig gi dbang phyug ni tshig rnams kyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de yang gsungs pa tshig gi dbang phyug ni tshig rnams kyi dbang phyug go //
translated: The Lord of Speech is the lord of words.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na smra ba che ste //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na smra ba che ste //
translated: Therefore, he is the Great Speaker.

original: smra ba yang de chen po yang de nyid yin pas smra ba che'o //
analyzed: smra ba yang de chen po yang de nyid yin pas smra ba che'o //
translated: He is the speaker and he is great, thus he is the Great Speaker.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na smra ba'i skyes mchog yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na smra ba'i skyes mchog yin no //
translated: Therefore, he is the Best of Speakers.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na /üîΩsmra ba'i rgyal zhes pa la mdzes pas na rgyal po ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na / smra ba'i rgyal zhes pa la mdzes pas na rgyal po ste /
translated: Therefore,üîΩhe is the King of Speakers.

original: smra ba rnams kyi rgyal po ni smra ba'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: smra ba rnams kyi rgyal po ni smra ba'i rgyal po'o //
translated: He is the king of speakers, thus he is the King of Speakers.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na smra ba'i dam pa ste /üîΩgtso bo zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na smra ba'i dam pa ste / gtso bo zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, he is the Best of Speakers.

original: smra ba rnams kyi dam pa ni smra ba'i dam pa'o //
analyzed: smra ba rnams kyi dam pa ni smra ba'i dam pa'o //
translated: He is the chief, thus he is the Best of Speakers.üîΩTherefore,

original: de nyid kyi phyir na mchog gi gnas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na mchog gi gnas so //
translated: he is the Supreme Abode.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na smra ba'i seng ge zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na smra ba'i seng ge zhes so //
translated: Therefore, he is the Lion of Speakers.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na tshugs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na tshugs pa med pa ste /
translated: Therefore, he is Unassailable.

original: gzhan rnams kyis mi tshugs pas na tshugs pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyis mi tshugs pas na tshugs pa med do //
translated: He is unassailable by others, thus he is Unassailable.

original: de nyid kyi yon tan gyi khyad par yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi yon tan gyi khyad par yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
translated: His special qualities are also mentioned:

original: kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //
analyzed: kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //
translated: He is Samantabhadra, the supreme joy,

original: gzi brjid phung po blta na sdug //üîΩces pa ni de la kun du lta ba ni kun nas lta ba'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de kun du lta ba ste /
analyzed: gzi brjid phung po blta na sdug // ces pa ni de la kun du lta ba ni kun nas lta ba'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de kun du lta ba ste /
translated: the mass of splendor, the beautiful.

original: kun du bzang po'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, Samantabhadra is he who has the nature of looking everywhere, because he has attained the gnosis of universal goodness.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na bcom ldan 'das kun @83a * //üîΩdu spro ba mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na bcom ldan 'das kun @83a * // du spro ba mkhyen pa'o //
translated: For that reason, the Lord is known as Samantabhadra.

original: mchog tu dga' ni don dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ni don dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Supreme joy is because of the analytical knowledges of meaning and of the teaching.

original: gzi brjid phung po ni brjid ni 'od do //üîΩphung po ni phreng ba'o /
analyzed: gzi brjid phung po ni brjid ni 'od do // phung po ni phreng ba'o /
translated: The mass of splendor is the garland of splendor.

original: gzi brjid phung po gang dang ldan pa de gzi brjid phung po'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid phung po gang dang ldan pa de gzi brjid phung po'o //
translated: He who has the mass of splendor is the mass of splendor.

original: blta na sdug ni ye shes mdzes pa dang gang ldan pa de blta na sdug ste /üîΩsdu gu ma zhes pa ni rig pa dang gang ldan pa de nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: blta na sdug ni ye shes mdzes pa dang gang ldan pa de blta na sdug ste /üîΩsdu gu ma zhes pa ni rig pa dang gang ldan pa de nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The beautiful is he who has the beauty of intuition.üîΩThe lovely is he who has the loveliness of the body.

original: 'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
analyzed: 'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
translated: The one with the brilliant light, the glorious calf,

original: lag pa 'od 'bar snang ba po //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: lag pa 'od 'bar snang ba po // zhes pa ni /
translated: the one with the light-radiating hand, the illuminator.

original: de la 'od bzangs ni 'od bzang pos dkyil 'khor byas nas rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'od bzangs ni 'od bzang pos dkyil 'khor byas nas rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the one with the brilliant light is so called because he is situated in the mandala of brilliant light.

original: 'bar ba ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten la cher snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bar ba ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten la cher snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The one with the blazing light is so called because he is the great light of the entire world, without exception.

original: dpal gyi be'u ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kan na dpal be'u'i gzugs can nyan thos la sogs pa thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bon las byung ba'i dngos po 'gro ba thams cad skyed par byed pa
analyzed: dpal gyi be'u ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kan na dpal be'u'i gzugs can nyan thos la sogs pa thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bon las byung ba'i dngos po 'gro ba thams cad skyed par byed pa
translated: The one with the glorious calf is so called because in the heart of all Tathagatas there is a calf-shaped figure of glory, which is the cause of the omniscience that is not shared in common with the disciples and so on, and which is the source of the generation of all beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yod do //
translated: This is the name of the Tathagata.

original: de yang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' kho na ste /
analyzed: de yang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' kho na ste /
translated: And because it is not shared in common, it is the Lord, the wisdom being of all Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi thugs kar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thugs kar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is situated in their hearts.

original: lag pa 'od 'bar snang ba po ni 'od kyi sgra ni gzi brjid kyi rnam grangs te /üîΩmtha' na yang ye ge aa yod pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa 'od 'bar snang ba po ni 'od kyi sgra ni gzi brjid kyi rnam grangs te / mtha' na yang ye ge aa yod pa'o //
translated: The light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.

original: lag pa yang de 'od kyang de nyid yin pas lag pa'i 'od rnams ni khro bo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis lag pa 'bar ba ni lag pa'i 'od 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: lag pa yang de 'od kyang de nyid yin pas lag pa'i 'od rnams ni khro bo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis lag pa 'bar ba ni lag pa'i 'od 'bar ba ste /
translated: The light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.

original: de rnams kyi snang ba ni lag pa'i 'od 'bar snang ba po'o //üîΩde khro bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de'i gzugs 'od zer 'phro ba'i sgo nas 'dul bar byed pa'i don te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi snang ba ni lag pa'i 'od 'bar snang ba po'o // de khro bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de'i gzugs 'od zer 'phro ba'i sgo nas 'dul bar byed pa'i don te /
translated: The light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.

original: 'di lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das lag pa'i 'od 'bar snang ba po zhes gsungs so //üîΩsman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das lag pa'i 'od 'bar snang ba po zhes gsungs so // sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
translated: The light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.

original: zug rdu 'byin pa bla na med //
analyzed: zug rdu 'byin pa bla na med //
translated: The light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.

original: ces pa ni de la sman pa che ni sman pa yang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas sman pa che na ni sman pa'i rgyal po che zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa ni de la sman pa che ni sman pa yang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas sman pa che na ni sman pa'i rgyal po che zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.üîΩThe light of the hand is the light of the blazing wrathful one.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nad thams cad 'joms pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nad thams cad 'joms pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it conquers all the sicknesses of passion, etc.

original: mchog ni mi shes pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i don du phyin ci ma log pa'i man ngag gi sman gtong bar byed pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: mchog ni mi shes pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i don du phyin ci ma log pa'i man ngag gi sman gtong bar byed pa'i phyir na /
translated: The best is the supreme physician, because he gives the medicine of unerring instruction for the purpose of curing the sickness of nescience.

original: mchog ces gsungs so //
analyzed: mchog ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus he is called the best.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na gtso bo zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na gtso bo zhes pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, he is the chief,

original: 'gro ba thams cad mngon par 'don pa'i @83b phyir ro ;
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad mngon par 'don pa'i @83b phyir ro ;
translated: because he delivers all migrating beings.

original: / zug rdu 'byin pa ni zug rdu 'byin mkhan no //
analyzed: / zug rdu 'byin pa ni zug rdu 'byin mkhan no //
translated: The extractor of darts is the one who extracts the darts.

original: zug rdu 'byin pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: zug rdu 'byin pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa ste /
translated: He is the one who has the method of extracting the darts,

original: sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa'i snying gi zug rdu 'byin par byed ba'i phyir yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gnyen po chos nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa'i snying gi zug rdu 'byin par byed ba'i phyir yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gnyen po chos nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he extracts the darts of passion, etc. from the hearts of all living beings, because he teaches the reality which is the antidote to those, just as it is.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na bla na med ces te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na bla na med ces te /
translated: For that very reason, he is the unsurpassed,

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
translated: the Blessed One, Manjusri.

original: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
analyzed: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
translated: The tree of all medicines.

original: nad do cog gi dgra che pa //
analyzed: nad do cog gi dgra che pa //
translated: The great enemy of all diseases.

original: zhes pa ni de la sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sman rnams ni sman rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sman rnams ni sman rnams so //
translated: Here, all the medicines are the trees of the forest, and all the trees are the medicines.

original: de rnams kyi ljon shing ni sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing ngo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi ljon shing ni sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing ngo //
translated: The trees of the forest are the medicines.

original: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das des 'gro ba kun rjes su gzung ba'i don du sman rnams kyi rgyal po chen por gyur par so sor snang ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das des 'gro ba kun rjes su gzung ba'i don du sman rnams kyi rgyal po chen por gyur par so sor snang ngo //
translated: Because the Blessed One appears as the great king of medicines for the sake of caring for all beings.

original: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: de dag dgon chen ljon pa'i shing du gyur //
analyzed: de dag dgon chen ljon pa'i shing du gyur //
translated: They become the trees of the great forest.

original: zhes so // nad do cog gi dgra che ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa de nad de yin pas nad do cog go //
analyzed: zhes so // nad do cog gi dgra che ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa de nad de yin pas nad do cog go //
translated: The great enemy of all diseases: desire and so on are the afflictions, and they are the diseases, so they are all diseases.

original: de rnams kyi dgra chen te de'i gnyen po chos nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dgra chen te de'i gnyen po chos nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are the great enemy, because the reality that is their antidote is well taught.

original: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
analyzed: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
translated: Beautiful, lovely in the three worlds,

original: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
translated: Glorious, with a mandala of stars,

original: zhes pa ni de la sdu gu'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la sdu gu'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúbeautiful‚Äù has already been explained.

original: 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ni 'gro ba thams cad dang mi mnyam pas 'jig rten gsum gyi spyi gtsug dbu rgyan thub pa nyid kyi phyir na de de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ni 'gro ba thams cad dang mi mnyam pas 'jig rten gsum gyi spyi gtsug dbu rgyan thub pa nyid kyi phyir na de de ltar gsungs so //
translated: ‚Äú Adorned with the crest of the three worlds‚Äù means that he is the crest jewel of the three worlds because he is unequalled by all beings.

original: dpal ldan ni de bzhin no //üîΩrgyu skar dkyil 'khor can ni /
analyzed: dpal ldan ni de bzhin no // rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can ni /
translated: ‚Äú Glorious‚Äù means just that.üîΩ‚Äú Possessing the circle of the lunar mansions‚Äù means

original: rgyu skar rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rgyu skar rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: the circle of the lunar mansions.

original: de 'dra ba'i gzugs dang gang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de ni rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can te de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩphyogs bcu can mkha'i mtha' gtugs par //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i gzugs dang gang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de ni rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can te de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro // phyogs bcu can mkha'i mtha' gtugs par //
translated: The Blessed One, who possesses such a form, is ‚Äúpossessing the circle of the lunar mansions‚Äù because he is of that nature.

original: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //üîΩzhes pa ni de la phyogs bcu rnams kyi nam mkha' ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs // zhes pa ni de la phyogs bcu rnams kyi nam mkha' ni phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' ste /
translated: ‚Äú The victory banner of the Dharma is well raised throughout the reaches of space in the ten directions‚Äù meansüîΩthe reaches of space in the ten directions.üîΩThe reaches of space in the ten directions is the space of the ten directions.

original: de yongs su mthar thug pa ni phyogs bcu nam mkha' mtha' gtugs pa'o //
analyzed: de yongs su mthar thug pa ni phyogs bcu nam mkha' mtha' gtugs pa'o //
translated: The limit of that is the reaches of space in the ten directions.

original: chos kyi rgyal mtshan yin pas na chos kyi rgyal mtshan te /
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal mtshan yin pas na chos kyi rgyal mtshan te /
translated: It is the banner of Dharma, and so it is the banner of Dharma.

original: chen po yang de yin la 'dzugs pa yang de yin pas chen po 'dzugs so //
analyzed: chen po yang de yin la 'dzugs pa yang de yin pas chen po 'dzugs so //
translated: It is great and it is raised, and so it is the raising of the great.

original: de'i don ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: phyogs bcu nam mkha' mthar thug pa rnams su chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba dang gang ldan pa de ni de ltar gsungs te /üîΩ'jig @84a * //
analyzed: phyogs bcu nam mkha' mthar thug pa rnams su chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba dang gang ldan pa de ni de ltar gsungs te / 'jig @84a * //
translated: He who possesses the raising of the great banner of Dharma in the ten directions to the ends of space is so described.

original: rten thams cad bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par 'phel ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rten thams cad bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par 'phel ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because he has raised the banner of the increase of the accumulations of merit and wisdom in all worlds.

original: 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste /
translated: The vast sole parasol for beings

original: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
translated: Has the orb of love and compassion.

original: zhes pa ni de la 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste ni 'gro ba rnams la gdugs ni 'gro ba'i gdugs te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste ni 'gro ba rnams la gdugs ni 'gro ba'i gdugs te /
translated: The vast sole parasol for beings: For beings, the parasol is the parasol for beings.

original: gcig pu ni gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: gcig pu ni gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: It is sole, being nondual.

original: yangs pa ste rgya che ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: yangs pa ste rgya che ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is vast, being extensive.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste /
translated: The Blessed One is the one parasol for the world,

original: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he destroys all the heat of the afflictions.

original: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can ni byams dang snying rje ste ;
analyzed: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can ni byams dang snying rje ste ;
translated: He has the orb of love and compassion, because love and compassion

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni de'i snying po len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni de'i snying po len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are his orb, since they are the essence of that.

original: dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //
analyzed: dpal ldan padma gar gyi bdag / khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //
translated: The glorious lord of the dance of the lotus, the great lord of the jewel parasol,

original: zhes pa de la dpal ldan gyi don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes pa de la dpal ldan gyi don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of glorious has already been explained.

original: padma gar gyi bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: padma gar gyi bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rtogs pa ste /
translated: The lord of the dance of the lotus is the realization of meditative concentration,

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: and that is the Blessed One.

original: khyab bdag chen po ni khyab bdag kyang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas khyab bdag chen po ste /
analyzed: khyab bdag chen po ni khyab bdag kyang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas khyab bdag chen po ste /
translated: He is the great lord, because he is the lord and he is great.

original: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: He is great because he is the nature of all things.

original: rin chen gdugs ni rin chen thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rin chen gdugs ni rin chen thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The jewel parasol is because he is the pledge of all jewels.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che //
translated: The great king of all buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo bo 'chang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo bo 'chang //
translated: He is the embodiment of the nature of all buddhas.

original: zhes pa ni de la sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che ni rgyal po yang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas rgyal po che'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che ni rgyal po yang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas rgyal po che'o //
translated: Here, he is the king of all buddhas, and he is great, so he is the great king.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che ste /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che ste /
translated: The great king of all buddhas of the three times is the great king of all buddhas.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because he is the nature of the vajra of the mind of enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo po 'chang ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kun bdag ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo po 'chang ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kun bdag ste /
translated: He is the embodiment of the nature of all buddhas. The nature of all buddhas is the nature of all buddhas.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because all phenomena are emptiness.

original: de'i ngo bo ni yod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni yod pa'o //
translated: His nature is existence.

original: de 'dzin pas nas na sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo bo 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas nas na sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo bo 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the embodiment of the nature of all buddhas because he holds that.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
translated: He is the great yoga of all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig //
translated: He is the single teaching of all buddhas.

original: ces pa ni de la sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che ni rnal 'byor che ni rnal 'byor yang de yin la chen po yang de yin pas rnal 'byor che'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni de la sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che ni rnal 'byor che ni rnal 'byor yang de yin la chen po yang de yin pas rnal 'byor che'o //
translated: Here, the great yoga of all buddhas is the great yoga, since it is a yoga and it is great.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che ste /
