original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it abides in the heart of all tathƒÅgatas.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: Again, it is said:

original: rnal 'byor chen po bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The great yoga is the BhagavƒÅn,

original: rdo rje sems @84b dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems @84b dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
translated: the vajra hero, the tathƒÅgata.

original: zhes so // de de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes so // de de ltar gsungs so //
translated: It is taught like that.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gcig ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gcig ste /
translated: The single teaching of all buddhas is the single teaching of all buddhas of the three times.

original: theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig go //
analyzed: theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig go //
translated: That which is the MahƒÅyƒÅna is the single teaching of all buddhas.

original: de ltar theg pa ni gcig kho na ste /
analyzed: de ltar theg pa ni gcig kho na ste /
translated: Thus, the vehicle is only one.

original: 'di ltar theg pa chen po zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar theg pa chen po zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said that it is like this, the MahƒÅyƒÅna.

original: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
translated: The glorious one who bestows the vajra jewel consecration,

original: rin chen kun bdag dbang phug ste /
analyzed: rin chen kun bdag dbang phug ste /
translated: the lord of all jewels, the lord of lords,

original: 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rje //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rje //
translated: the lord of all worlds,

original: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi bdag //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi bdag //
translated: the self of all vajra holders,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
translated: the great mind of all buddhas.

original: zhes pa ni de la rdo rje rin che ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la rdo rje rin che ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Here, the vajra jewel is Akshobhya.

original: de bzhin du dbang bskur dpal ni rdo rje sems ma'o //üîΩrin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste ni rin chen kun ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang bskur dpal ni rdo rje sems ma'o // rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste ni rin chen kun ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: Similarly, the glorious one who bestows consecration is Vajrasattva.

original: de'i bdag po dang dbang phyug ni rin chen rdo rje ma'o //üîΩ'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: de'i bdag po dang dbang phyug ni rin chen rdo rje ma'o // 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: The lord of all jewels is Ratnasambhava, and his lord and master is Ratnavajra.

original: de'i rje bo ni chos kyi rdo rje ma'o //üîΩrdo rje 'chang ba kun ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rje bo ni chos kyi rdo rje ma'o // rdo rje 'chang ba kun ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The lord of all worlds is Amitabha, and his master is Dharmavajra.

original: de'i bdag ni las kyi rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag ni las kyi rdo rje ma'o //
translated: The all-pervading vajra holder is Amoghasiddhi, and his self is Karmavajra.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba ni sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba ni sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The great mind of all buddhas is Vairochana.

original: de'i thugs che ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
analyzed: de'i thugs che ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
translated: His great mind is VajradhƒÅtvƒ´≈õvarƒ´.

original: de yang don 'di ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang don 'di ltar 'gyur te /
translated: This is the meaning:

original: rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang gang 'brel pa de rnams kyi rigs kyi yum lnga gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal te /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang gang 'brel pa de rnams kyi rigs kyi yum lnga gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal te /
translated: The five mothers of the families of those who are connected with the five transcendent lords such as Vajraratna are the nature of the transcendent lord Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / 'khor lo rnams thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang / 'khor lo rnams thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because he has attained the vajra, the jewel, the lotus, the crossed vajra, and the wheel.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
translated: He dwells in the mind of all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
translated: He is the great body of all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
translated: He is also the speech of all buddhas.

original: zhes pa ni de la sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas ni thugs kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas ni thugs kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba ni sku'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba ni sku'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin ni /
translated: He is also the speech of all buddhas because he is the nature of speech.

original: gsung gi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsung gi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of speech.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said in the glorious Guhyasamaja Tantra:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes so //
translated: The vajra of body, speech, and mind of all Tathagatas.

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: And that is the Bhagavat, the wisdom being of all Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
translated: The vajra sun, great light,

original: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
analyzed: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
translated: the vajra moon, stainless light.

original: ces pa ni de la rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che ni rdo rje nyi ma ni ye shes kyi snang ba chen pos khams gsum pa @85a * //
analyzed: ces pa ni de la rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che ni rdo rje nyi ma ni ye shes kyi snang ba chen pos khams gsum pa @85a * //
translated: The vajra sun, great light, means that the vajra sun is the great light of wisdom,

original: thams cad cher snang bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir dal de skad cas gsungs so //üîΩrdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
analyzed: thams cad cher snang bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir dal de skad cas gsungs so // rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
translated: because it illuminates the entire three realms with its great light.

original: ces pa ni rdo rje zla ba ni ye shes zla ba ste /
analyzed: ces pa ni rdo rje zla ba ni ye shes zla ba ste /
translated: The vajra moon, stainless light, means that the vajra moon is the moon of wisdom.

original: de'i dri ma med pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi skyon thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dri ma med pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi skyon thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Its stainlessness is because it is free from all faults of the instincts of all addictions.

original: 'od ni gsal ba ste grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: 'od ni gsal ba ste grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
translated: Light is clarity, and he who possesses the illumination of countless world-realms is so called.

original: chog de gnyis 'di ltar pa stan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: chog de gnyis 'di ltar pa stan par 'gyur te /
translated: These two perfections are taught as follows:

original: sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu la sogs par rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ram zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par byas te /
analyzed: sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu la sogs par rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ram zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par byas te /
translated: The son of good lineage, etc., who practices the mantra path, should visualize a sun or moon disc in his heart.

original: de'i steng du yi ge aa bsams nas ming gi don gzhan dang gzhan so so gang yang rung ba don mngon du byas te 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag par bya'o zhes man ngag tu'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge aa bsams nas ming gi don gzhan dang gzhan so so gang yang rung ba don mngon du byas te 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag par bya'o zhes man ngag tu'o //
translated: On top of that he should visualize the syllable A, and then, having actualized the meaning of the name of any deity he wishes, he should recite the Noble Confession of Failings.üîΩThis is the instruction.

original: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
analyzed: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
translated: Devoid of attachment, and so on, is greatly attached.

original: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //üîΩces pa la /
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //üîΩces pa la /
translated: Having various colors, it is radiant light.

original: de la chags bral la sogs chags pa che //üîΩzhes pa ni /
analyzed: de la chags bral la sogs chags pa che // zhes pa ni /
translated: He is the great passion of those who are free from passion and so forth.

original: des ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rang bzhin phye ba gsungs te /
analyzed: des ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rang bzhin phye ba gsungs te /
translated: This is saying that the nature of the yogis is being taught.

original: 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba la zhugs pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi de'i rang bzhin med pa de kho na la bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba la zhugs pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi de'i rang bzhin med pa de kho na la bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The one who is free from passion and who is engaged in passion is the BhagavƒÅn in that reality which is the absence of intrinsic nature of those who practice the perfections and who practice the conduct of the tantric vehicle.

original: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
translated: He is the blazing light of various colors.

original: ces pa la kha dog sna chogs ni kha dog sna tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa la kha dog sna chogs ni kha dog sna tshogs pa ste /
translated: Various colors are the various colors.

original: de'i 'bar ba'i 'od ni mun pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing gsal ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bar ba'i 'od ni mun pa thams cad rnam par 'joms shing gsal ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The blazing light of those is the light that conquers all darkness and illuminates. He who has that is so-called.

original: de ltar yang 'dir bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal de nyid kyis 'od sna tshogs pa'i sgo rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i gdul bya sna tshogs pa'i rigs dang / bsam pa dang / spyod dang / mos pa dang / dbang po rnams skad cig gis dus gcig kho nar mi rtag pa dag sdug bsngal dang /
analyzed: de ltar yang 'dir bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal de nyid kyis 'od sna tshogs pa'i sgo rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i gdul bya sna tshogs pa'i rigs dang / bsam pa dang / spyod dang / mos pa dang / dbang po rnams skad cig gis dus gcig kho nar mi rtag pa dag sdug bsngal dang /
translated: The various types of minds are those of the various types of dispositions, thoughts, conduct, interests, and faculties. He causes them to be liberated by means of the various types of liberations, such as impermanence, suffering,

original: mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa la sogs pa zhi ba dang rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / phung po dang khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs par phye ba dang /
analyzed: mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa la sogs pa zhi ba dang rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / phung po dang khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs par phye ba dang /
translated: selflessness, peace, nonarising, noncessation, and so on, and by means of the various types of divisions, such as natural nirvƒÅ·πáa, and by means of the various types of classifications, such as the aggregates, constituents, sense spheres, dependent origination, the four truths of the ƒÅryas, and so on.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpang @85b po la sogs pa'i dbyibs dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi dbye bas dang /üîΩskad sna tshogs dang sgo sna tshogs dang / mngon par brjod pa sna tshogs pa dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs dang / 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu rtogs pa sna tshogs rnams kyis skad cig ma de nyid kho na la bstan pa'i mkhyen pas chos rab tu bstan par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpang @85b po la sogs pa'i dbyibs dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi dbye bas dang / skad sna tshogs dang sgo sna tshogs dang / mngon par brjod pa sna tshogs pa dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs dang / 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu rtogs pa sna tshogs rnams kyis skad cig ma de nyid kho na la bstan pa'i mkhyen pas chos rab tu bstan par mdzad pas na /
translated: The buddhas' knowledge of teaching the Dharma in a single instant is shown by their knowledge of the different kinds of beings to be trained, their different faculties, their different aspirations, their different kinds of conduct, their different levels of spiritual accomplishment, their different kinds of mental activity, their different languages, their different ways of thinking, their different kinds of miracles, their different kinds of engagement, their different vehicles and their different kinds of realization of the result.üîΩüîΩ

original: mtshan gyi sngags kyi tshig 'di yang bla mas bstan pa'i man ngag gang las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' la sbyar bar bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: mtshan gyi sngags kyi tshig 'di yang bla mas bstan pa'i man ngag gang las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' la sbyar bar bya'o zhes so //
translated: This mantra of the name is also to be applied to the Bhagavat, the Knowledge Being of all Tathagatas, according to the instruction of the Guru.

original: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The perfect Buddha, in the vajra posture,

original: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
translated: the holder of the Dharma of the world.

original: zhes pa ni de la rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas ni bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i rdo rje skyil krung ni rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas ni bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i rdo rje skyil krung ni rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes so //
translated: The perfect Buddha in the vajra posture is the Bhagavat, the perfect Buddha Sakyamuni, in the vajra posture.

original: bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa 'dis bdud bzhi las mchog tu rgyal bas na zad pa dang mi skye ba mkhyen pa mngon du byed pa dang ldan pa'i phyir de yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa 'dis bdud bzhi las mchog tu rgyal bas na zad pa dang mi skye ba mkhyen pa mngon du byed pa dang ldan pa'i phyir de yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
translated: The Bhagavat is the same as the one who has realized the knowledge of exhaustion and non-arising, because he has triumphed over the four Maras.

original: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa ni 'gro bar mdzad pas na 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa ni 'gro bar mdzad pas na 'gro ba ste /
translated: The holder of the Dharma of the world is the world because he moves.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro ba'o //
translated: The going of the buddhas is the going of the buddhas.

original: de ltar yang 'gro bar bya zhing bdag gis brtsad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang 'gro bar bya zhing bdag gis brtsad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, one should go in that way and I should dispute.

original: de nyid kyi chos te de 'dzin pas na sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin te de yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi chos te de 'dzin pas na sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin te de yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
translated: He is the bearer of the Dharma of the going of the buddhas, because he holds that Dharma. He is also the Bhagavat.

original: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
analyzed: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
translated: Glorious, born from a lotus,

original: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
translated: a buddha, holding the treasure of omniscient wisdom.

original: zhes pa na de la dpal ldan ni bshad zin to //üîΩsangs rgyas padma skyes ni sangs rgyas nyid padma bas sangs rgyas padma rnams te /
analyzed: zhes pa na de la dpal ldan ni bshad zin to // sangs rgyas padma skyes ni sangs rgyas nyid padma bas sangs rgyas padma rnams te /
translated: Here, the glorious has been explained.

original: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi dri ma rnams kyis nye bar ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi dri ma rnams kyis nye bar ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Born from a lotus, a buddha, means that the buddhas are lotuses, because they are not sullied by the stains of the latent afflictions.

original: de las byung bas na sangs rgyas padma skyes so //
analyzed: de las byung bas na sangs rgyas padma skyes so //
translated: He is born from that, so he is born from a lotus, a buddha.

original: de nyid bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: He is also the Bhagavat.

original: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni kun mkhyen ye shes so //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni kun mkhyen ye shes so //
translated: The treasury of omniscient pristine awareness is the pristine awareness of omniscience.

original: de nyid mdzod dang snod khyim ste /
analyzed: de nyid mdzod dang snod khyim ste /
translated: It is a treasury, a container, a house.

original: de 'chang bas na kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin no //
analyzed: de 'chang bas na kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin no //
translated: Since he holds it, he is the holder of the treasury of omniscient pristine awareness.

original: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang //üîΩche ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang //
analyzed: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang // che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang //
translated: The king is the holder of various magical powers.

original: zhes pa ni de la rgyal po ni @86a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la rgyal po ni @86a * //
translated: The great one is the Buddha, the holder of the knowledge mantras.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi las bstan cing legs par bshad pa dag gis 'jig rten la bsgo bar byed pas na rgyal po ste /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi las bstan cing legs par bshad pa dag gis 'jig rten la bsgo bar byed pas na rgyal po ste /
translated: The king is the one who teaches and explains well the ten virtuous actions to the world, and so he is called the king.

original: de nyid bcom ldan 'das so //üîΩsgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ni sgyur 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ni sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan 'das so // sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ni sgyur 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ni sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs pa ste /
translated: That is the Blessed One.üîΩThe holder of various magical powers is the one who holds various magical powers.

original: sprul pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: sprul pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: Magical powers are various emanations.

original: de 'dzin pas na sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ngo //
translated: Since he holds them, he is the holder of various magical powers.

original: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang //
analyzed: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang //
translated: The great one is the Buddha, the holder of the knowledge mantras.

original: zhes pa la sangs rgyas rnams kyi rig sngags ni sangs rgyas rig sngags te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sangs rgyas rnams kyi rig sngags ni sangs rgyas rig sngags te /
translated: The knowledge-mantra of the Buddhas is the Buddha‚Äôs knowledge-mantra.

original: sangs rgyas rig sngags ni gzungs bzhi ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rig sngags ni gzungs bzhi ste /
translated: The Buddha‚Äôs knowledge-mantra is the four retentions,

original: chos dang don dang sngags dang bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnams so //
analyzed: chos dang don dang sngags dang bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnams so //
translated: which have the nature of Dharma, meaning, mantra, and patience.

original: de rnams 'dzin pas ni 'di sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de rnams 'dzin pas ni 'di sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang ngo //
translated: He is the Buddha‚Äôs knowledge-mantra holder because he holds them.

original: de nyid che ba zhes pa ste //
analyzed: de nyid che ba zhes pa ste //
translated: That is the greatness.

original: kun du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is because of his omnipresence.

original: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
translated: He is the sharp vajra, the great sword,üîΩthe supreme syllable, and the pure.

original: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag / ces pa ni de la rdo rje rnon po ni phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag / ces pa ni de la rdo rje rnon po ni phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bos so //
translated: The sharp vajra is the nature of the great seal.

original: ral gri che ni las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ral gri che ni las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The great sword is the nature of the action seal.

original: rnam par dag pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam ste /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam ste /
translated: The pure is the book of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
translated: Moreover, it is through the seal of commitment.

original: yi ge mchog ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: yi ge mchog ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
translated: The supreme syllable is through the seal of Dharma.

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas de kho na phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pas rdo rje rnon po zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas de kho na phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pas rdo rje rnon po zhes gsungs so //
translated: Moreover, the Bhagavat, the primordial Buddha, is called ‚Äúthe sharp vajra‚Äù because he is sealed with the four seals.

original: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
analyzed: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
translated: The great vehicle is the cutter of suffering,

original: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos //
analyzed: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos //
translated: the great weapon, the vajra Dharma.

original: zhes pa ni de la sdug bsngal ni nye par len pa'i phung po rnams te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la sdug bsngal ni nye par len pa'i phung po rnams te /
translated: Here, suffering is the appropriated aggregates.

original: de rnams gcod pas na sdug bsngal gcod pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams gcod pas na sdug bsngal gcod pa'o //
translated: Since they are cut by it, it is the cutter of suffering.

original: de nyid theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: de nyid theg pa chen po ste /
translated: That itself is the great vehicle,

original: lam gyi bden pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lam gyi bden pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the truth of the path.

original: de'i rdo rje chos ni ye shes kyi chos te /
analyzed: de'i rdo rje chos ni ye shes kyi chos te /
translated: Its vajra Dharma is the Dharma of wisdom.

original: chos de mi mthun pa'i phyogs gcod pa'i phyir mtshon cha chen pa'o ;
analyzed: chos de mi mthun pa'i phyogs gcod pa'i phyir mtshon cha chen pa'o ;
translated: Because that Dharma cuts the discordant class, it is the great weapon.

original: / de dang gang ldan pa de ni /
analyzed: / de dang gang ldan pa de ni /
translated: He who possesses that

original: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
analyzed: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
translated: is the great vehicle, the cutter of suffering,

original: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos te /
analyzed: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos te /
translated: the great weapon, the vajra Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: He is the Bhagavat.

original: rdo rje zab mo dzin dzik / rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig / ces pa ni de la rdo rje zab mo rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rdo rje zab mo dzin dzik / rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig / ces pa ni de la rdo rje zab mo rdo rje ste /
translated: The profound vajra is Jinjika.üîΩVajra-mati knows the meaning as it is.

original: ye shes zab mo 'di rdo rje zab mo'o //
analyzed: ye shes zab mo 'di rdo rje zab mo'o //
translated: Here, the profound vajra is the profound intuition.

original: yang na zab mo ni gzung 'dzin la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi rang bzhin dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: yang na zab mo ni gzung 'dzin la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi rang bzhin dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
translated: Or, the profound is the nature of wisdom free from the conceptualization of subject and object, etc.

original: dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Jin is the Tathagatas Akshobhya, etc.

original: de rnams las rgyal ba dang zil gyis gnon pa la bdag po yin pas na dzin dzik ste /
analyzed: de rnams las rgyal ba dang zil gyis gnon pa la bdag po yin pas na dzin dzik ste /
translated: Since he is the lord of victory and supremacy over them, he is Jinjika.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: That is the Lord Vairocana.

original: @86b de yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal nyid do //
analyzed: @86b de yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal nyid do //
translated: And he is the Lord Manjusri himself.

original: rdo rje blo gros ni rdo rje 'dra ba'i mi phyed pa'i blo gros dang gang ldan pa de rdo rje blo gros te /
analyzed: rdo rje blo gros ni rdo rje 'dra ba'i mi phyed pa'i blo gros dang gang ldan pa de rdo rje blo gros te /
translated: Vajra-mati is he who has the vajra-like, indivisible wisdom.

original: gzung 'dzin la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pas bsdus pa thams cad kyis mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pas bsdus pa thams cad kyis mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not divided by anything included in the conceptualization of subject and object, etc.

original: don bzhin rig ni ji ltar gnas pa'i don rnam par rig pas don bzhin rig go //
analyzed: don bzhin rig ni ji ltar gnas pa'i don rnam par rig pas don bzhin rig go //
translated: It is the knowledge of reality, because it is the knowledge of reality as it is.

original: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
translated: It is the perfection of all perfections.

original: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
translated: It is the ornament of all stages.

original: zhes pa la pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa ni pha rol phyin pa kun ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa la pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa ni pha rol phyin pa kun ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The perfection of all perfections is the perfection of the perfections of giving, etc.

original: de rnams rdzogs pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: de rnams rdzogs pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
translated: He who has the method of perfecting them is so described.

original: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan ni sa rnams kun ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan ni sa rnams kun ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The ornament of all stages is the mandala of all the stages, the Joyful, etc.

original: de nyid kyi rgyan te dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rgyan te dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
translated: He who is the ornament of that mandala is so described.

original: rnam par dag pa chos bdag med //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa chos bdag med //
translated: It is the purity of the selflessness of things.

original: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
analyzed: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
translated: It is the good moonlight of pure intuition.

original: zhes pa ni da la rnam par dag pa'i chos ni rnam par dag pa so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid grub pa ste ;
analyzed: zhes pa ni da la rnam par dag pa'i chos ni rnam par dag pa so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid grub pa ste ;
translated: This is the accomplishment of the pure Dharma, which has the characteristic of pure discernment.

original: bdag med pa ni snang ba med par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa ni snang ba med par byed pa'o //
translated: Selflessness is what makes the appearance disappear.

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes de nyid zla ba ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes de nyid zla ba ste /
translated: That very perfect intuition is the moon.

original: kun du bzang po'i sems bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i sems bskyed pa ste /
translated: It is the generation of the mind of universal enlightenment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: It is the intuition body of all the transcendent lords, because it is the nature of all the transcendent lords.

original: de nyid bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: That itself is the transcendent lord.

original: 'od bzang ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes te de dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar ro //
analyzed: 'od bzang ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes te de dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar ro //
translated: Good light is the intuition that is the form of the moon mandala, which is naturally radiant. He who possesses that is so described.

original: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste /
analyzed: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste /
translated: The great hero is the net of magical emanations.

original: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / zhes pa ni de la /
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog / zhes pa ni de la /
translated: He is the supreme lord of all the tantras.

original: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste //
analyzed: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste //
translated: The great hero is the net of magical emanations.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the verse number.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni sprul pa'i tshogs te /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni sprul pa'i tshogs te /
translated: The net of magical emanations is the assembly of emanations.

original: brtson chen dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar ro //
analyzed: brtson chen dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar ro //
translated: He who possesses the great hero is so described.

original: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po ni rgyud kun ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la sogs pa'i bdag po ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po ni rgyud kun ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la sogs pa'i bdag po ni gtso bo ste /
translated: The lord of all tantras is the lord of all tantras, such as the Yoga Tantra, etc.

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because he is of their very nature.

original: mchog ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: mchog ni bshad zin to //
translated: The supreme has been explained.

original: rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan //
translated: He is endowed with the entire vajra seat.

original: ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //
analyzed: ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //
translated: He holds all the bodies of intuition.

original: zhes pa ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyi skyil mo krung dang gang ldan pa de ni rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyi skyil mo krung dang gang ldan pa de ni rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan no //
translated: He who is endowed with the vajra seat, which is the nature of the samadhi of the entire and the non-remaining, is endowed with the entire vajra seat.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //üîΩzhes pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang // zhes pa ste /
translated: he holds all the bodies of intuition.

original: ye shes lnga po ma lus pa'i sku rnams ma lus 'chang do //
analyzed: ye shes lnga po ma lus pa'i sku rnams ma lus 'chang do //
translated: He holds all the bodies of the five intuitions.

original: kun du bzang po blo gros bzang //
analyzed: kun du bzang po blo gros bzang //
translated: He is Samantabhadra, he is Good Intellect,

original: sa yi mngal te 'gro ba 'dzin //üîΩzhes pa ni de la kun du bzang po ni kun las bzang zhing dge ba gang yin @87a * //
analyzed: sa yi mngal te 'gro ba 'dzin // zhes pa ni de la kun du bzang po ni kun las bzang zhing dge ba gang yin @87a * //
translated: he is the womb of the stages, he is the holder of the world.

original: pa de ni kun du bzang po ste /
analyzed: pa de ni kun du bzang po ste /
translated: Here, he who is good in every way, who is good and virtuous in every way, is Samantabhadra.

original: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of being the nature of the vajra of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: blo gros bzang ni legs pa'i blo gros ni blo gros bzang po ste /
analyzed: blo gros bzang ni legs pa'i blo gros ni blo gros bzang po ste /
translated: Good Intellect is good intellect.

original: rtog pa'i dra ba thams cad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa'i dra ba thams cad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of being free from all nets of conceptualization.

original: sa'i mngal zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sa'i mngal zhes pa ni /
translated: The womb of the earth is

original: de la sa'i khams te snod kyi 'jig rten no //
analyzed: de la sa'i khams te snod kyi 'jig rten no //
translated: the element of earth, the world receptacle.

original: de'i mngal ni skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de sa'i mngal lo //
analyzed: de'i mngal ni skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de sa'i mngal lo //
translated: The womb of that is that which generates it, the womb of the earth.

original: 'gro ba 'dzin ni 'gro ba ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dzin ni 'gro ba ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
translated: The holder of the world is the world, the world of sentient beings.

original: de 'dzin pa ni 'dzin par byed pas na 'gro ba 'dzin te 'gro ba kun gyi rten zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa ni 'dzin par byed pas na 'gro ba 'dzin te 'gro ba kun gyi rten zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Holder is that which holds, that which holds the world, the meaning of the basis of all worlds.

original: tshig de gnyis kyis g-yo pa dang mi g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig de gnyis kyis g-yo pa dang mi g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of being the nature of all things, moving and unmoving, by means of those two words.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che //
translated: The great essence of all Buddhas

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
translated: holds the various emanation wheels.

original: zhes pa ni de la sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: The great essence of all buddhas is the cause of the generation of all tathƒÅgatas of the three times.

original: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bdag nyid yin pa de'i phyir /üîΩsangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bdag nyid yin pa de'i phyir / sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che //
translated: Because the BhagavƒÅn is the nature of the vajra mind of enlightenment,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: therefore he is the great essence of all buddhas.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Therefore,

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang //
translated: he is the holder of the various emanation wheels.

original: zhes pa sna tshogs ni rnam par sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sna tshogs ni rnam par sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: Various means manifold.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lta rnams yang dag par ston pa'i bdag nyid kyi sprul pa ni sna tshogs sprul pa'i //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lta rnams yang dag par ston pa'i bdag nyid kyi sprul pa ni sna tshogs sprul pa'i //
translated: Emanation is the nature of revealing the mundane and supramundane views.

original: de'i 'khor lo ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i 'khor lo ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: His wheel is the emanation wheel, the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: de 'dzin pas na sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang ngo //
translated: Since he holds it, he is the holder of the various emanation wheels.

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
translated: The supreme nature of all things, the holder of the nature of all things.

original: zhes pa ni de la dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog ni dngos po yang de yin la kun yang de yin pas dngos po kun ni g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba dang mi g-yo la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog ni dngos po yang de yin la kun yang de yin pas dngos po kun ni g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba dang mi g-yo la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Here, the supreme nature of all things is all things and also all, thus it is the nature of all things, such as the moving and unmoving, the unmoving, and so on.

original: de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The nature of those is the nature of all things.

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang de yin la mchog kyang de nyid yin pas dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog go //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang de yin la mchog kyang de nyid yin pas dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog go //
translated: That is also the nature of all things and also the supreme, thus it is the supreme nature of all things.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid kyi yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid kyi yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because that is the nature of the body of exalted wisdom of the pure suchness of the limit of reality of the Bhagavat.

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin ni de nyid kyi phyir na dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin ni de nyid kyi phyir na dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The holder of the nature of all things is the nature of all things for that very reason.

original: chos thams cad bdag med par 'jug pa 'dzin pas na dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin te /
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag med par 'jug pa 'dzin pas na dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin te /
translated: It holds the nature of all things because it holds the entry into the selflessness of all things.

original: rnam pa thams cad du chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the emptiness of the great in every way.

original: skye med chos de sna tshogs @87b don ;
analyzed: skye med chos de sna tshogs @87b don ;
translated: That dharma of non-production is the various meanings,

original: / chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
analyzed: / chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
translated: holding the essence of all dharmas.

original: zhes pa ni de la skye med chos ni skye ba med cing rang bzhin med pa'i chos dang gang ldan pa de skye med chos te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la skye med chos ni skye ba med cing rang bzhin med pa'i chos dang gang ldan pa de skye med chos te /
translated: As for that, the dharma of non-production is the dharma of non-production and the dharma of no intrinsic nature.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid ni don dam par skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid ni don dam par skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because dependent origination itself is ultimately non-produced.

original: sna tshogs don ni kun rdzob tu 'gro ba thams cad rjes su 'dzin pa'i don byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs don ni kun rdzob tu 'gro ba thams cad rjes su 'dzin pa'i don byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The various meanings are the various meanings of the relative, which are the meanings of the activities of taking care of all transmigrators.

original: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba ni de la chos kun gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba ni de la chos kun gang zhe na /
translated: Holding the essence of all dharmas is as follows. What are all dharmas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang / bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /üîΩgzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang /
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang / bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang /
translated: the aggregates, the elements, the sense sources, dependent origination, the perfections, the levels, emptiness, the aspects of enlightenment, the truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables,üîΩthe formless absorptions, the liberations, the superknowledges, the meditative stabilizations, the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, the powers, the fearlessnesses, the aspects of correct understanding, great love,

original: snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: great compassion, the distinct attributes of a buddha, the fruits of asceticism, omniscience, suchness, the very limit of reality, the absence of marks,

original: don dam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba chos de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni chos kun rang bzhin te /
analyzed: don dam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba chos de rnams kyi rang bzhin ni chos kun rang bzhin te /
translated: The nature of those phenomena is called the ultimate, the expanse of reality.

original: de yang ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes nas de 'dzin pas na chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de yang ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes nas de 'dzin pas na chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ngo //
translated: And since one fully understands that nature as it is and holds it, one holds the essence of all phenomena.

original: de ltar yang ye shes zhabs kyi gsungs pa //
analyzed: de ltar yang ye shes zhabs kyi gsungs pa //
translated: As J√±ƒÅnapƒÅda says:

original: yang dag byang chub sems bskyed nas //
analyzed: yang dag byang chub sems bskyed nas //
translated: Having aroused the mind of perfect awakening,

original: byams pa chen po rab sbyor te //
analyzed: byams pa chen po rab sbyor te //
translated: one applies great love

original: chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa //
translated: and understands that all phenomena are selfless.

original: de ltar shes na rnam par grol //
analyzed: de ltar shes na rnam par grol //
translated: If one understands that, one is liberated.

original: zhes so // shes rab chen po'i skad cig la //
analyzed: zhes so // shes rab chen po'i skad cig la //
translated: In a single instant of great wisdom,

original: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa 'chang //
analyzed: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa 'chang //
translated: one holds the realization of all phenomena.

original: zhes pa ni de la shes thab kyang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas shes rab chen po ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la shes thab kyang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas shes rab chen po ste /
translated: Here, wisdom is great because it is wisdom and it is great.

original: chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of the discernment of all phenomena.

original: skad cig kyang de yin la gcig kyang de nyid yin pas skad cig go //
analyzed: skad cig kyang de yin la gcig kyang de nyid yin pas skad cig go //
translated: An instant is a single moment.

original: de bas na de'i don ni 'di ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bas na de'i don ni 'di ltar 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of this is as follows.

original: dus kyi skad cig ma nyid la shes rab chen po nyid kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i chos thams cad du shes pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: dus kyi skad cig ma nyid la shes rab chen po nyid kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i chos thams cad du shes pa'i phyir na /
translated: In a single moment of time, through great wisdom, one understands all phenomena as they are taught.

original: shes rab chen po'i skad cig la //
analyzed: shes rab chen po'i skad cig la //
translated: In a single moment of great wisdom,

original: chos kun khong du chung pa'o //
analyzed: chos kun khong du chung pa'o //
translated: all phenomena are understood.

original: de 'dzin pas na shes rab chen po'i skad cig la chos kun mngon par rtogs pa 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na shes rab chen po'i skad cig la chos kun mngon par rtogs pa 'chang ngo //
translated: Because one holds that, in a single moment of great wisdom, one holds the realization of all phenomena.

original: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste /
translated: The realization of all phenomena

original: yang dag @88a * //
analyzed: yang dag @88a * //
translated: is the perfect

original: mthar thug mchog gi blo //
analyzed: mthar thug mchog gi blo //
translated: mind that reaches the ultimate.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is stated.

original: de la chos kun mngon par rtogs pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: de la chos kun mngon par rtogs pa zhes pa la /
translated: Regarding the realization of all phenomena,

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mngon par rtogs pa ni chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mngon par rtogs pa ni chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste /
translated: the realization of the nature of all phenomena is the realization of all phenomena.

original: yang dag par thugs su chud pa dang gang ldan pa de ni chos kun mngon par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par thugs su chud pa dang gang ldan pa de ni chos kun mngon par rtogs pa'o //
translated: One who possesses the perfect understanding is the one who realizes all phenomena.

original: yang dag mthar thug ces pa la yang dag pa ni bden pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag mthar thug ces pa la yang dag pa ni bden pa ste /
translated: Regarding the perfect ultimate, perfect means true.

original: de bzhin nyid ces pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ces pa'i bar du'o //
translated: up to suchness.

original: de'i mtha' ni yang dag mtho //
analyzed: de'i mtha' ni yang dag mtho //
translated: The culmination of that is the perfect end.

original: mthar thug pa yang de yin la yang dag mtha' yang de nyid yin pas yang dag mthar thug go //
analyzed: mthar thug pa yang de yin la yang dag mtha' yang de nyid yin pas yang dag mthar thug go //
translated: It is the culmination of that, and it is the perfect end, thus it is the culmination of the perfect end.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na mchog gi blo ni rnal 'byor can gyi skye shes te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na mchog gi blo ni rnal 'byor can gyi skye shes te /
translated: Therefore, the supreme mind is the intuition of the yogin,

original: yang dag pa'i don bsgoms pas rab kyi mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don bsgoms pas rab kyi mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the culmination of the highest meditation on the meaning of reality.üîΩThe steadfast one, with unshakable faith,

original: mi g-yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag / yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'chang //
analyzed: mi g-yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag / yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'chang //
translated: upholds perfect supreme enlightenment.

original: zhes pa ni de la mi g-yo ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su song ba'i bying ba dang rgod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la mi g-yo ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su song ba'i bying ba dang rgod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therein, unshakable means that he is without either the slackness or excitedness which are adverse to concentration.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na rab tu dang ba'i bdag ces pa ste ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na rab tu dang ba'i bdag ces pa ste ;
translated: Therefore, he is called the steadfast one with unshakable faith,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi bar chad gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi bar chad gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is without the two obstructions to concentration.

original: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'chang ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'chang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'chang ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'chang zhes gsungs so //
translated: The one who holds perfect complete enlightenment is the Bhagavat, because he holds unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //üîΩye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa // ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
translated: The one who is the direct perception of all buddhas

original: zhes pa la //üîΩde la / sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //
analyzed: zhes pa la // de la / sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //
translated: is the flame of the wisdom fire, shining with bright light.

original: zhes pa ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon sum pa ni yang dag par rang gis rig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon sum pa ni yang dag par rang gis rig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The one who is the direct perception of all buddhas is the Bhagavat, because he is the direct perception of all buddhas of the three times, due to his own perfect knowledge.

original: ye shes me lce ni shes rab kyi mar me'o //
analyzed: ye shes me lce ni shes rab kyi mar me'o //
translated: The flame of the wisdom fire is the lamp of wisdom.

original: 'od rab gsal ni brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du snang bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'od rab gsal ni brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du snang bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Shining with bright light means that he illuminates all the inexpressible buddhafields.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i rang bzhin gyis dbang po 'ang rab 'bring tha chungs kyi sems can gdul bya rnams la phan 'dogs pas na 'jig rten las 'das
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i rang bzhin gyis dbang po 'ang rab 'bring tha chungs kyi sems can gdul bya rnams la phan 'dogs pas na 'jig rten las 'das
translated: Therefore, the BhagavƒÅn, the wisdom body of all tathƒÅgatas, benefits all migrating beings by nature. Since he benefits sentient beings to be trained with sharp, middling, and dull faculties, he is transcendent.

original: pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i sgo nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rab tu rdzogs pa'i don du gzugs sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i sgo nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rab tu rdzogs pa'i don du gzugs sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: He displays various forms in order to fully perfect the results of the accumulations of merit and wisdom and the bh≈´mis and perfections through teaching the samƒÅdhis of all transcendent beings.

original: de la dbang po rtul po'i sems can 'ga' zhig 'dul ba la tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis dang / dbang po @88b 'bring po nyan tshogs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnams kha cig la phan 'dogs pa'i don du de'i gzugs kyis kun snang ngo //
analyzed: de la dbang po rtul po'i sems can 'ga' zhig 'dul ba la tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis dang / dbang po @88b 'bring po nyan tshogs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnams kha cig la phan 'dogs pa'i don du de'i gzugs kyis kun snang ngo //
translated: For the sake of training some sentient beings with dull faculties, he appears in the form of BrahmƒÅ. For the sake of benefiting some beings with middling faculties of the ≈õrƒÅvaka and pratyekabuddha types, he appears in that form.

original: dbang po rnon po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rnams la 'ga' zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' dang / tshogs dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i rim pas bdag gi dngos po bstan pas dang / 'ga' zhig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo dang /
analyzed: dbang po rnon po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rnams la 'ga' zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' dang / tshogs dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i rim pas bdag gi dngos po bstan pas dang / 'ga' zhig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo dang /
translated: For those of sharp faculties, the bodhisattvas of the bodhisattva potential, the reality of the self is taught in some places through the stages of the bodhisattvas, the assemblies, the levels and the perfections, in some places through the essence of the unsurpassable perfect complete enlightenment,

original: 'ga' zhig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo dang / 'ga' zhig 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rnams dang / sems can bkres pa rnams kha cig la phan 'dogs pa'i don du bu ma pa bzhad po la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis dang /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo dang / 'ga' zhig 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rnams dang / sems can bkres pa rnams kha cig la phan 'dogs pa'i don du bu ma pa bzhad po la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis dang /
translated: in some places through the essence of the unsurpassable perfect complete enlightenment and in some places through the essence of the mundane and supramundane gnosis, and for the sake of benefiting some hungry sentient beings, through the form of a jester, a clown and so forth.

original: nad chen pos gzir ba'i sems can kha cig la sman chen po la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis dang / de la sogs pa rnams kyis g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyis 'gro ba la phan 'dogs pa'i don du rjes su sgrub par byed pa'i sngags kyi yi ge tshig nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lngar rnam par spros te /
analyzed: nad chen pos gzir ba'i sems can kha cig la sman chen po la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis dang / de la sogs pa rnams kyis g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyis 'gro ba la phan 'dogs pa'i don du rjes su sgrub par byed pa'i sngags kyi yi ge tshig nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lngar rnam par spros te /
translated: The mantra syllables are emanated as two hundred seventy-five syllables.

original: de rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas rnam pa lngar phye la /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas rnam pa lngar phye la /
translated: Those are divided into five types by means of the families.

original: rigs re re la yang mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig lnga bcu rtsa lngar sbyar nas mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge de rnams kyis kyang phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su song ste /
analyzed: rigs re re la yang mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig lnga bcu rtsa lngar sbyar nas mtshan gyi sngags kyi yi ge de rnams kyis kyang phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su song ste /
translated: Each of those families is applied to the mantra syllables of the name as fifty-five syllables. Those mantra syllables of the name go to the buddha realms in the ten directions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa mthun par bsgrubs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor yang snang bar byas nas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams rang gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas dag par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad pa mthun par bsgrubs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor yang snang bar byas nas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams rang gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas dag par byas te /
translated: Having accomplished the deeds of all the Tathagatas in harmony, they illuminate the retinue of all the Tathagatas and the retinue of all the Bodhisattvas, and having purified the sentient beings who engage in desire by means of their own door of liberation,

original: rang gi rigs kyi kha dog gis nye bar bsgos pa rnams yang phyir log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol 'khor lo gsum pa la ji lta ba'i rim pas rnam par gnas par blta'o //
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi kha dog gis nye bar bsgos pa rnams yang phyir log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol 'khor lo gsum pa la ji lta ba'i rim pas rnam par gnas par blta'o //
translated: they return again, and one should see them abiding in the outer enclosure of the great mandala of the vajra realm in the manner of the three wheels, suffused with the color of their own family.

original: de bas na sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos sngar bstan pa'i gzugs rnam pa gsum du dmigs te /
analyzed: de bas na sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos sngar bstan pa'i gzugs rnam pa gsum du dmigs te /
translated: Therefore, the son or daughter of good lineage who practices the conduct by means of mantra should visualize the three types of forms as previously explained,

original: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag go //
analyzed: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag go //
translated: and recite the Noble One, the Praise in Honor of One Worthy of Honor.

original: yon tan gyi tshogs thob bo zhes pa na man ngag go //
analyzed: yon tan gyi tshogs thob bo zhes pa na man ngag go //
translated: The statement one obtains the collection of qualities is the instruction.

original: tshigs bcad ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te /
analyzed: tshigs bcad ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te /
translated: There are forty-two verses.

original: mtshan gyi sngags kyi sgo yi ge'i tshig ni nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga ste grangs so //
analyzed: mtshan gyi sngags kyi sgo yi ge'i tshig ni nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lnga ste grangs so //
translated: There are two hundred seventy-five words of the mantra of the name, which is the door of the letters.

original: 'phags pa mtshan yang @89a * //
analyzed: 'phags pa mtshan yang @89a * //
translated: This is the enumeration.

original: dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par lta ba las so sor kun du rtog pa'i rim par phye ba ste brgya pa'o /
analyzed: dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par lta ba las so sor kun du rtog pa'i rim par phye ba ste brgya pa'o /
translated: This is the hundredth chapter of the commentary on the name of the noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, called ‚ÄúThe View of the Meaning of the Secret Mantra Name,‚Äù which is the section on the stages of discernment.

original: // / de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku'i bstod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku'i bstod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: This was spoken from the perspective of the wisdom of equality, in terms of praising the wisdom body of the wisdom being of all the transcendent lords, the tathƒÅgatas, Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste /
translated: It is the supreme accomplishment of the desired aim,

original: ngan song thams cad rnams sbyong ba /
analyzed: ngan song thams cad rnams sbyong ba /
translated: the purification of all lower realms,üîΩthe lord, the supreme of all sentient beings,

original: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / sems can thams cad rab grol byed //
analyzed: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / sems can thams cad rab grol byed //
translated: the liberator of all sentient beings.

original: ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: And so on.

original: de la 'dod pa'i don grub ni don du gnyer bar bya bas na don te /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa'i don grub ni don du gnyer bar bya bas na don te /
translated: The purpose is the object of desire.üîΩ

original: 'dod pa yang de yin la don yang de nyid pas 'dod pa'i don te /
analyzed: 'dod pa yang de yin la don yang de nyid pas 'dod pa'i don te /
translated: The one who accomplishes the desired aim is the one who accomplishes the desired aim, because he is the one who accomplishes the desired aim.üîΩHe is the one who accomplishes the desired aim, because he is the one who accomplishes the desired aim.

original: de sgrub par byed cing skyed par byed pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
analyzed: de sgrub par byed cing skyed par byed pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
translated: He is Ratnasa·πÉbhava, because he is the one who accomplishes and generates the desired aim.

original: ser snas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams par dag pa'i sbyin pa'i sgo nas yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir na de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
analyzed: ser snas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams par dag pa'i sbyin pa'i sgo nas yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir na de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
translated: He is the Bhagavat himself, because he is the one who perfectly joins those sentient beings who are suffering from miserliness through the door of pure generosity.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na yang dam pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na yang dam pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, he is also the highest,

original: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he engages in generosity that is completely pure of the three spheres.

original: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //üîΩzhes pa la /
analyzed: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba // zhes pa la /
translated: He purifies all evil destinies.

original: ngan song thams cad ni dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song rnams so //
analyzed: ngan song thams cad ni dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song rnams so //
translated: All evil destinies are the hells, hungry ghosts, and animals.

original: / de rnams rnam par sbyong ba ni der 'jug pa'i las yang dag par sbyor bas de dag ngan song las 'don par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / de rnams rnam par sbyong ba ni der 'jug pa'i las yang dag par sbyor bas de dag ngan song las 'don par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Purifying them means that by applying the activity of entering into them, he accomplishes the deliverance of those beings from the evil destinies.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na sems can tham las cad kyi mchog ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na sems can tham las cad kyi mchog ste /
translated: Therefore, he is the best of all beings.

original: gzhan don bya ba la mngon par brtson pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan don bya ba la mngon par brtson pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because he is intent on working for the benefit of others.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yang mgon med pa'i sems can gyi mgon zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yang mgon med pa'i sems can gyi mgon zhes gsungs so /
translated: Therefore, he is also called the protector of beings who are without protection.

original: sems can thams cad rab grol byed ni gdul bya'i rigs dang / spyod pa dang / bag la nyal dang / mos pa dang / dbang po rnams kyis 'dul ba rnams la nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam gyi man ngag rab tu sbyin pa'i sgo nas rab tu grol bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad rab grol byed ni gdul bya'i rigs dang / spyod pa dang / bag la nyal dang / mos pa dang / dbang po rnams kyis 'dul ba rnams la nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam gyi man ngag rab tu sbyin pa'i sgo nas rab tu grol bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: He is the liberator of all beings because he liberates those to be trained by means of the instructions on the paths to the enlightenments of the sravakas, etc. by means of the instructions on the paths to the enlightenments of the sravakas, etc. according to the various types of disciples, their conduct, their latent tendencies, their interests, and their faculties.

original: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
analyzed: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
translated: He is the hero in the battle with the afflictions,

original: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //
analyzed: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //
translated: the one who conquers the arrogance of the enemy, ignorance.

original: dpal ldan dh'i: ste sgeg 'chang zhing /
analyzed: dpal ldan dh'i: ste sgeg 'chang zhing /
translated: He is the glorious one, the bearer of grace,

original: dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //
analyzed: dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //
translated: The hero who assumes the form of the ugly.

original: zhes pa ni de la nyon mongs pa'i g-yul du gcig dpa' ba ni nyon mongs pa ni 'dod 'chags la sogs pa de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab pa gang yin pa de nyon @89b mongs gul der dpa' po gcig bu kho na gnyis su med ni nyon mongsüîΩpa'i gul dug gcig dpa' ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la nyon mongs pa'i g-yul du gcig dpa' ba ni nyon mongs pa ni 'dod 'chags la sogs pa de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab pa gang yin pa de nyon @89b mongs gul der dpa' po gcig bu kho na gnyis su med ni nyon mongs pa'i gul dug gcig dpa' ba ste /
translated: Here, the hero in the battle against the addictions is the one who fights with the addictions, such as lust, etc. He is the hero in the battle against the addictions, the one and only, the non-dual.

original: nyon mongs pa dang nye pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ro mnyam par yongs su skyong bar rtsom zhing chos rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang nye pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ro mnyam par yongs su skyong bar rtsom zhing chos rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is the hero in the battle against the addictions, because he is the one who is engaged in the protection of the equality of all addictions and secondary addictions, and in the completion of the Dharma.

original: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms ni mi shes pa ni gti mug ste /
analyzed: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms ni mi shes pa ni gti mug ste /
translated: He is the destroyer of the pride of the enemy, ignorance. Ignorance is delusion.

original: bden pa la sogs pa la blo phyin ci log gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa la sogs pa la blo phyin ci log gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the perversion of the mind with regard to the truths, etc.

original: de nyid dgra ste dge ba'i phyogs so sor 'ching ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid dgra ste dge ba'i phyogs so sor 'ching ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the enemy, because it is the fetter of the virtuous side.

original: de'i rgyal ni dregs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyal ni dregs pa'o //
translated: Its pride is its haughtiness.

original: de 'joms pas na mi shes dgra'i dregs pa 'joms so //
analyzed: de 'joms pas na mi shes dgra'i dregs pa 'joms so //
translated: He is the destroyer of the pride of the enemy, ignorance, because he destroys it.

original: dpal ldan ni shad zin to //
analyzed: dpal ldan ni shad zin to //
translated: Glorious is explained.

original: dh'i: zhes bya ba ni dang po sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i sa bon te /
analyzed: dh'i: zhes bya ba ni dang po sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i sa bon te /
translated: Dhi·∏• is the seed syllable that generates the first Buddha.

original: de nyid sgeg par ldan te /
analyzed: de nyid sgeg par ldan te /
translated: That itself is endowed with grace.

original: sgeg pa ni shu kra'o //
analyzed: sgeg pa ni shu kra'o //
translated: Grace is ≈õukra.

original: kun nas bskyed pa dang 'byin pas na sgeg 'chang ste /
analyzed: kun nas bskyed pa dang 'byin pas na sgeg 'chang ste /
translated: Since it generates and emits, it is the bearer of grace.

original: de yang dbang po la khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir de 'dzin pas na de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de yang dbang po la khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir de 'dzin pas na de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Moreover, since it pervades the sense organs, it is called that because it holds that.üîΩThe hero who bears the form of the ugly is the one who has the experience of a hero and the experience of the ugly.

original: dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba ni dpa' bo'i nyams dang ldan pa dang / mi sdug pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i khro bo'i khyad par gang yin pa de rnams kyi gzugs ni dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs te /
analyzed: dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba ni dpa' bo'i nyams dang ldan pa dang / mi sdug pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i khro bo'i khyad par gang yin pa de rnams kyi gzugs ni dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs te /
translated: The form of those who are wrathful is the hero who bears the form of the ugly.

original: de 'dzin pas nad pa'i bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas nad pa'i bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba'o //
translated: Since he holds that, he is the hero who bears the form of the ugly.

original: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
analyzed: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
translated: Shaking all one hundred arms,

original: gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa //
analyzed: gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa //
translated: dancing with the strength of the gait,

original: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas rtsol ba //
analyzed: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas rtsol ba //
translated: the glorious one with one hundred arms

original: nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
analyzed: nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
translated: dancing, pervading space.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de la lag dpa' brgya po kun bskyod cing /üîΩgom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa ni lag pa brgya po rnams kun bskyod cing zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de la lag dpa' brgya po kun bskyod cing / gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa ni lag pa brgya po rnams kun bskyod cing zhes pa ni /
translated: All one hundred of his hands are agitated,üîΩand he dances with the strength of his steps.

original: lag pa brgya po rnams kun du bskyod pas phyi rol du bskor zhing gom pa'i gnas la g-yas brkyang pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lag pa brgya po rnams kun du bskyod pas phyi rol du bskor zhing gom pa'i gnas la g-yas brkyang pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: All one hundred of his hands are agitated means that by agitating all one hundred of his hands, he turns outward and extends his right foot, and so on, in the place of his steps.

original: de'i stobs kyis mtho lnga la sogs par bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis mtho lnga la sogs par bskyod pa ste /
translated: By the strength of that, he agitates five fathoms, and so on.

original: lag pa rgya po kun bskyod pa dang gom pa'i stobs de gnyis kyis gar byed pa dang gang ldan pha de de ltar ro //
analyzed: lag pa rgya po kun bskyod pa dang gom pa'i stobs de gnyis kyis gar byed pa dang gang ldan pha de de ltar ro //
translated: He who possesses the strength of agitating all one hundred of his hands and the strength of his steps dances in that way.

original: sa la spyod pa'i gar bstan nas gzhan yang nam mkha' la spyod pa'i gar bstan par 'dod pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: sa la spyod pa'i gar bstan nas gzhan yang nam mkha' la spyod pa'i gar bstan par 'dod pas gsungs pa /
translated: Having explained the dance of the earth, in order to explain the dance of the sky, it is said:

original: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas rtsol ba //
analyzed: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas rtsol ba //
translated: The glorious one with one hundred hands

original: nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
analyzed: nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
translated: dances pervading the sky.

original: dpal ldan ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: dpal ldan ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
translated: The glorious one is Padmanarteshvara.

original: de'i lag pa brgya ni dpal ldan lag pa brgya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i lag pa brgya ni dpal ldan lag pa brgya ba'o //
translated: His one hundred hands are the glorious one with one hundred hands.

original: de rnams kyis rtsol pa ni mdzes par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyis rtsol pa ni mdzes par gnas pa ste /
translated: He is the one who is beautiful in his effort,

original: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas rtsol ba'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas rtsol ba'o //
translated: the one who is glorious with a hundred hands.

original: des nam mkha'i ste nam mkha' la kun du rtsol zhing @90a * //üîΩyongs su bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar gsungs so //üîΩsa yid dkyil 'khor gzhi gnod pa //üîΩrkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //üîΩrkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //üîΩtshang pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon /üîΩzhes pa de la /üîΩsa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi gnon pa /üîΩrkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //üîΩzhes pa la /üîΩsa'i dkyil 'khor gzhi ni sa'i dkyil 'khor gzhi ni sa'i dkyil 'khor ngos te /

analyzed: de'i mthil ni rkang pa ya gcig gi mthil lo //
translated: The sole of the foot is the sole of the foot.üîΩThe foot is the foot.üîΩThe sole of the foot is the sole of the foot.üîΩThe foot is the foot.üîΩThe sole of the foot is the sole of the foot.üîΩThe foot is the foot.

translated: The sole of the foot is the sole of the foot.üîΩThe foot is the foot.üîΩThe sole of the foot is the sole of the foot.üîΩThe foot is the foot.

analyzed: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //
translated: The sole of the foot is the sole of the foot.üîΩThe foot is the foot.üîΩThe sole of the foot is the sole of the foot.üîΩThe foot is the foot.

analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon ni rkang ba'i mthe ba mo ni rkang pa'i mthe bo ste /
