original: de'i sen mo ni rkang mthe ba sen mo'o //üîΩtshangs pa'i yul gyi sa'i rtse mo ni tshangs pa'i yul sa'i rtse mo'o //
analyzed: de'i sen mo ni rkang mthe ba sen mo'o //üîΩtshangs pa'i yul gyi sa'i rtse mo ni tshangs pa'i yul sa'i rtse mo'o //
translated: The sole of the foot is the sole of the foot.üîΩThe

original: des gnon pas rkang mtheb sen mos gnon pa dang gang ldan pa de rkang mtheb sen po khyon gyis kyang /
analyzed: des gnon pas rkang mtheb sen mos gnon pa dang gang ldan pa de rkang mtheb sen po khyon gyis kyang /
translated: Since it is pressed down, the big toe presses down on it.üîΩ

original: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon te /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon te /
translated: The one who is endowed with the toes and nails that press down on the earth with the soles of the feet presses down on the realm of Brahma with the soles of the feet.

original: tshig de gnyis kyis ni des 'dul ba'i skyes bo la phan gdags pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das de'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: tshig de gnyis kyis ni des 'dul ba'i skyes bo la phan gdags pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das de'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu bstan pa yin no //
translated: These two lines indicate the power of the Bhagavat's miracles for the purpose of benefiting the beings to be disciplined by him.

original: don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don /
analyzed: don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don /
translated: The meaning is one, the meaning of the Dharma is nondual,

original: dam pa'i don de 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: dam pa'i don de 'jigs pa med //
translated: the ultimate meaning is fearless,

original: rnam rig sna rig sna tshogs gzugs don can /
analyzed: rnam rig sna rig sna tshogs gzugs don can /
translated: the meaning of the Dharma is the meaning of the various forms of consciousness.

original: sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyud //
analyzed: sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyud //
translated: The mind and the stream of consciousness

original: ces pa ni de la don gcig ni yang dag pa'i don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro /
analyzed: ces pa ni de la don gcig ni yang dag pa'i don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro /
translated: The meaning is one because of the nature of the ultimate meaning that is real.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na gnyis med chos kyi don zhes te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na gnyis med chos kyi don zhes te /
translated: For that very reason, it is the meaning of the Dharma that is nondual,

original: gzung 'dzin gnyis mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gnyis mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the duality of object and subject is not tenable.

original: dam pa'i don ni don dang / thob pa dang / sgrub pa dag las thob pa don dam pa nyid do //
analyzed: dam pa'i don ni don dang / thob pa dang / sgrub pa dag las thob pa don dam pa nyid do //
translated: The ultimate meaning is the ultimate meaning itself from among the ultimate meaning, the attainment, and the practice, because it is the object of the highest wisdom.

original: 'jigs pa med ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The fearless one is like space.

original: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug go //
analyzed: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug go //
translated: The various cognitions are the six engaging consciousnesses, which have the form of objects.

original: sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The mind is the storehouse consciousness.

original: @90b rnam par shes pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid do //
analyzed: @90b rnam par shes pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid do //
translated: Consciousness is the afflicted mind.

original: de yang rim pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de yang rim pa 'di yin te /
translated: Moreover, this is the sequence:

original: sems kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid las nyon mongs pa can gyi yid do //
analyzed: sems kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid las nyon mongs pa can gyi yid do //
translated: From the mind, which has the characteristic of the storehouse consciousness, there is the afflicted mind.

original: de las kyang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug rnams te /
analyzed: de las kyang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug rnams te /
translated: From that, there are the six engaging consciousnesses.

original: yul la rnam par g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid rnams so //
analyzed: yul la rnam par g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid rnams so //
translated: They have the characteristic of movement toward objects.

original: yang de'i bag chags kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las bsgos pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las kyang nyon mongs pa can gyi yod de /
analyzed: yang de'i bag chags kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las bsgos pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las kyang nyon mongs pa can gyi yod de /
translated: Moreover, the latent impressions of that are infused in the storehouse consciousness. From the storehouse consciousness, there is the afflicted mind.

original: de las kyang yang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug go //
analyzed: de las kyang yang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug go //
translated: From that, there are again the six engaging consciousnesses.

original: de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'i 'khor lo phra mo yongs su 'khor ro //
analyzed: de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'i 'khor lo phra mo yongs su 'khor ro //
translated: Thus, the subtle wheel of dependent origination turns.

original: de ltar yang gsungs pa //
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs pa //
translated: Thus it is said:

original: rnam par smin dang ngan sems dang / yul la rnam par rig pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin dang ngan sems dang / yul la rnam par rig pa'o //
translated: The maturation, the evil mind, and the cognition of the object.

original: zhes so // des ci gsungs par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: zhes so // des ci gsungs par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What does that mean?

original: gang yul rig pa'i mtshan nyid rnams la ngar sems dang / gang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid de /
analyzed: gang yul rig pa'i mtshan nyid rnams la ngar sems dang / gang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid de /
translated: Those which have the characteristic of cognizing the object, the mind that thinks ‚ÄúI,‚Äù and the afflicted mind‚Äî

original: de rnams ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid do //
translated: those are the Bhagavat himself.

original: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'/
analyzed: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'/
translated: He delights in all things,

original: stong pa nyid dga' mchog gi blo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dga' mchog gi blo //
translated: his mind delights in the highest emptiness,

original: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs las 'das /
analyzed: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs las 'das /
translated: he is beyond the desire of existence, and so forth,

original: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
analyzed: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
translated: he is the great delight of the three existences.

original: zhes pa ni de la dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don rnams te gnas pa la sogs pa de rnams la dga' ba ni spro ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don rnams te gnas pa la sogs pa de rnams la dga' ba ni spro ba ste /
translated: He delights in all things means that he delights in all things without exception, in their abiding and so forth, because of his delight in the highest emptiness.

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi dbang gi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi dbang gi phyir ro //
translated: This is because of the power of worldly convention.

original: de ltar yang klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa //
analyzed: de ltar yang klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa //
translated: Thus it is said by the venerable Nagarjuna:

original: gnas dang skye dang 'jig rten yod med dang // dman dang mnyam dang khyab par gang yang rung //
analyzed: gnas dang skye dang 'jig rten yod med dang // dman dang mnyam dang khyab par gang yang rung //
translated: and all that is pervaded by these,üîΩthe buddhas have taught as emptiness.üîΩThe buddhas have taught that all things are empty,

original: 'jig rten tha snyad dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: 'jig rten tha snyad dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: due to the power of worldly convention,

original: gsung gi yang dag dbang las ma yin no /
analyzed: gsung gi yang dag dbang las ma yin no /
translated: not due to the power of reality.

original: zhes so / stong pa nyid dga' ni stong pa nyid la dga' zhing spro ba ste /
analyzed: zhes so / stong pa nyid dga' ni stong pa nyid la dga' zhing spro ba ste /
translated: The delight in emptiness is the delight in and joy of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid dga' ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dga' ste /
translated: The delight in emptiness is

original: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the suchness of the reality of all things.

original: don dam par ni de yang nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par ni de yang nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But ultimately, that also is not perceived.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na mchog gi blo zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na mchog gi blo zhes so //
translated: Therefore, it is called the supreme mind.

original: srid pa'i dod chag sogs las 'das ni //
analyzed: srid pa'i dod chag sogs las 'das ni //
translated: Beyond existence, nonexistence, and so on,

original: de 'dod pa'i srid pa dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i srid pa gsum las 'dod chags so //
analyzed: de 'dod pa'i srid pa dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i srid pa gsum las 'dod chags so //
translated: it is beyond the three kinds of existence: the existence of desire, the existence of form, and the existence of the formless.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa ni srid pa'i 'dod chags kho na ste /
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa ni srid pa'i 'dod chags kho na ste /
translated: The existence of form and the existence of the formless are just the attachment to existence.

original: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ni ma yin no //
translated: They are not the attachment to desire.

original: de ltar yang chos mngon pa las gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang chos mngon pa las gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, it says in the Abhidharma:

original: khams gnyis las skyes srid @91a * //
analyzed: khams gnyis las skyes srid @91a * //
translated: Born from the two realms,

original: 'dod chags // zhes so //
analyzed: 'dod chags // zhes so //
translated: existence is attachment.

original: de de ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa las 'das shing brgal bas na /
analyzed: de de ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa las 'das shing brgal bas na /
translated: Thus, since he has gone beyond and escaped from attachment to desire and so forth,

original: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs las 'das //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs las 'das //
translated: he is beyond attachment to existence and so forth.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus, it is said.

original: de nyid bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal lo //
translated: He is the Bhagavat Manjushri.

original: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa ni 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'i srid pa gsum po yang snga ma de bzhin te /
analyzed: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa ni 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa'i srid pa gsum po yang snga ma de bzhin te /
translated: The great delight of the three existences is the three existences of the desire realm and so forth, just as before.

original: sa de las skyes pa'i lha'i bu rnams la phan gdags pa'i don du de dang de ru skye ba bstan pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: sa de las skyes pa'i lha'i bu rnams la phan gdags pa'i don du de dang de ru skye ba bstan pa'i phyir na /
translated: In order to benefit the sons of gods born from those grounds, he demonstrates birth here and there.

original: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
analyzed: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
translated: Therefore, he is the great delight of the three existences.

original: zhes so // sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar //üîΩ'od bzangs ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od //
analyzed: zhes so // sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar // 'od bzangs ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od //
translated: He is white like a pure white cloud,üîΩwith excellent light like the light of an autumn moon,

original: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
translated: beautiful like the center of the rising sun,

original: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar //
analyzed: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar //
translated: with the light of his nails extremely red,

original: cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
analyzed: cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
translated: with an excellent crown protuberance at the peak,

original: skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang //
analyzed: skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang //
translated: He wears the great crest of the highest hair.

original: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
analyzed: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
translated: He has the glory of the great jewel radiance.

original: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
translated: He is adorned with the emanations of the Buddha.

original: zhes pa ni de la dag pa ni ma rig pa'i dri ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la dag pa ni ma rig pa'i dri ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, ‚Äúpure‚Äù means that he has abandoned the stain of ignorance.

original: lhag ma tshigs bcad rnams ni shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i nang du gtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku'i rnal 'byor dang po las bshad pa'i tshig khyad par can gzhan rnams yin pa de bas na 'dir ma bkrol lo //
analyzed: lhag ma tshigs bcad rnams ni shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i nang du gtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku'i rnal 'byor dang po las bshad pa'i tshig khyad par can gzhan rnams yin pa de bas na 'dir ma bkrol lo //
translated: The remaining verses are the other special words explained in the yoga of the gnosis body of all the transcendent lords that is included in the wheel of wisdom.

original: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
translated: He shakes a hundred world systems.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs dang ldan //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs dang ldan //
translated: He has the power of the bases of miraculous powers.

original: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
analyzed: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
translated: He is the great holder of mindfulness.

original: dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
analyzed: dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
translated: The four mindfulnesses are the victors of meditative concentration.

original: zhes pa ni de la 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod ba ni 'jig rten khams brgya rnams ni 'jig rten khams brgya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de la 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod ba ni 'jig rten khams brgya rnams ni 'jig rten khams brgya'o //
translated: Here, ‚Äúhe shakes a hundred world systems‚Äù means that he shakes a hundred world systems.

original: de kun bskyod pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de 'jig rten gyi khams brgya kun bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de kun bskyod pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de 'jig rten gyi khams brgya kun bskyod pa'o //
translated: Whoever has the method of shaking all of those shakes a hundred world systems.
